GE07mbh_09_u:436: 09,005.002a śalyaś ca citrasenaś ca śakuniś ca mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:726: 09,009.052a tāvakāḥ samare rājan rakṣitā dṛḍhadhanvanā 09,009.052c pratyudyayur arātīṃs te samantād vigatavyathāḥ 09,009.053a madrarājaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ parivārya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:727: 09,009.053c sthitā rājan mahāsenā yoddhukāmāḥ samantataḥ 09,009.054a sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:729: 09,009.055a parivārya raṇe vīrāḥ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire 09,009.055c bāṇaśabdaravāṃś cogrān kṣveḍāṃś ca vividhān dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:730: 09,009.056a tathaiva tāvakāḥ sarve madrādhipatim añjasā 09,009.056c parivārya susaṃrabdhāḥ punar yuddham arocayan 09,009.057a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam 09,009.057c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_09_u:731: 09,009.058a yathā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ pūrvam āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:733: 09,009.059a tataḥ kapidhvajo rājan hatvā saṃśaptakān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:734: 09,009.059c abhyadravata tāṃ senāṃ kauravīṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ 09,009.060a tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ śeṣā dhṛṣṭadyumnapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:735: 09,009.060c abhyadhāvanta tāṃ senāṃ visṛjantaḥ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_09_u:737: 09,009.061c na ca jajñur anīkāni diśo vā pradiśas tathā 09,009.062a āpūryamāṇā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ pāṇḍavacoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:739: 09,009.062e kauravy avadhyata camūḥ pāṇḍuputrair mahārathaiḥ 09,009.063a tathaiva pāṇḍavī senā śarai rājan samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:741: 09,009.064a te sene bhṛśasaṃtapte vadhyamāne parasparam 09,009.064c vyākule samapadyetāṃ varṣāsu saritāv iva 09,009.065a āviveśa tatas tīvraṃ tāvakānāṃ mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:742: 09,009.065c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca rājendra tathābhūte mahāhave 09,010.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,010.001a tasmin vilulite sainye vadhyamāne parasparam 09,010.001c dravamāṇeṣu yodheṣu ninadatsu ca dantiṣu 09,010.002a kūjatāṃ stanatāṃ caiva padātīnāṃ mahāhave 09,010.002c vidruteṣu mahārāja hayeṣu bahudhā tadā 09,010.003a prakṣaye dāruṇe jāte saṃhāre sarvadehinām 09,010.003c nānāśastrasamāvāpe vyatiṣaktarathadvipe 09,010.004a harṣaṇe yuddhaśauṇḍānāṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
GE07mbh_09_u:746: 09,010.006a pāṇḍavās tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vyadhaman niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:747: 09,010.006c tathaiva tāvakā yodhā jaghnuḥ pāṇḍavasainikān 09,010.007a tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne yuddhe bhīrubhayāvahe 09,010.007c pūrvāhṇe caiva saṃprāpte bhāskarodayanaṃ prati 09,010.008a labdhalakṣāḥ pare rājan rakṣitāś ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:748: 09,010.008c ayodhayaṃs tava balaṃ mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_09_u:749: 09,010.009a balibhiḥ pāṇḍavair dṛptair labdhalakṣaiḥ prahāribhiḥ 09,010.009c kauravy asīdat pṛtanā mṛgīvāgnisamākulā
GE07mbh_09_u:750: 09,010.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdatīṃ senāṃ paṅke gām iva durbalām 09,010.010c ujjihīrṣus tadā śalyaḥ prāyāt pāṇḍucamūṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:751: 09,010.011a madrarājas tu saṃkruddho gṛhītvā dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:753: 09,010.012a pāṇḍavāś ca mahārāja samare jitakāśinaḥ 09,010.012c madrarājaṃ samāsādya vivyadhur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,010.012d*0060_01 tathaiva tāvakā yaudhā dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 09,010.013a tataḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇair madrarājo mahābalaḥ 09,010.013c ardayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ dharmarājasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:754: 09,010.014a prādurāsaṃs tato rājan nānārūpāṇy anekaśaḥ 09,010.014c cacāla śabdaṃ kurvāṇā mahī cāpi saparvatā
GE07mbh_09_u:756: 09,010.015c ulkā bhūmiṃ divaḥ petur āhatya ravimaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_09_u:757: 09,010.016a mṛgāś ca māhiṣāś cāpi pakṣiṇaś ca viśāṃ pate 09,010.016c apasavyaṃ tadā cakruḥ senāṃ te bahuśo nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:760: 09,010.016d*0061_03 śastrāgreṣv abhavaj jvālā netrāṇy āhatya varṣatī
GE07mbh_09_u:761: 09,010.016d*0061_04 śiraḥ svalīyanta bhṛśaṃ kākolūkāś ca ketuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:762: 09,010.017a tatas tad yuddham atyugram abhavat saṃghacāriṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:763: 09,010.017c tathā sarvāṇy anīkāni saṃnipatya janādhipa 09,010.017e abhyayuḥ kauravā rājan pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm 09,010.018a śalyas tu śaravarṣeṇa varṣann iva sahasradṛk
GE07mbh_09_u:765: 09,010.019a bhīmasenaṃ śaraiś cāpi rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaḥ 09,010.019c draupadeyāṃs tathā sarvān mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:766: 09,010.020a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca śaineyaṃ śikhaṇḍinam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_09_u:767: 09,010.020c ekaikaṃ daśabhir bāṇair vivyādha ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:769: 09,010.021a tataḥ prabhadrakā rājan somakāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:770: 09,010.021c patitāḥ pātyamānāś ca dṛśyante śalyasāyakaiḥ 09,010.022a bhramarāṇām iva vrātāḥ śalabhānām iva vrajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:771: 09,010.022c hrādinya iva meghebhyaḥ śalyasya nyapatañ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:772: 09,010.023a dviradās turagāś cārtāḥ pattayo rathinas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:773: 09,010.023c śalyasya bāṇair nyapatan babhramur vyanadaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:774: 09,010.024a āviṣṭa iva madreśo manyunā pauruṣeṇa ca
GE07mbh_09_u:775: 09,010.024c prācchādayad arīn saṃkhye kālasṛṣṭa ivāntakaḥ 09,010.024e vinardamāno madreśo meghahrādo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:776: 09,010.025a sā vadhyamānā śalyena pāṇḍavānām anīkinī 09,010.025b*0062_01 pradudrāva mahārāja śalyabāṇaiḥ prapīḍitā
GE07mbh_09_u:778: 09,010.026a tāṃ samarpya tataḥ saṃkhye laghuhastaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:780: 09,010.026d*0063_01 vavarṣa samare kruddho dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 09,010.027a tam āpatantaṃ pattyaśvaiḥ kruddho rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:781: 09,010.027c avārayac charais tīkṣṇair mattaṃ dvipam ivāṅkuśaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:782: 09,010.028a tasya śalyaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ mumocāśīviṣopamam 09,010.028c so 'bhyavidhyan mahātmānaṃ vegenābhyapatac ca gām
GE07mbh_09_u:783: 09,010.029a tato vṛkodaraḥ kruddhaḥ śalyaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:784: 09,010.029c pañcabhiḥ sahadevas tu nakulo daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:785: 09,010.030a draupadeyāś ca śatrughnaṃ śūram ārtāyaniṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:786: 09,010.030c abhyavarṣan mahābhāgaṃ meghā iva mahīdharam 09,010.031a tato dṛṣṭvā tudyamānaṃ śalyaṃ pārthaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:787: 09,010.031c kṛtavarmā kṛpaś caiva saṃkruddhāv abhyadhāvatām 09,010.032a ulūkaś ca patatrī ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:788: 09,010.032c smayamānaś ca śanakair aśvatthāmā mahārathaḥ 09,010.032e tava putrāś ca kārtsnyena jugupuḥ śalyam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:789: 09,010.033a bhīmasenaṃ tribhir viddhvā kṛtavarmā śilīmukhaiḥ 09,010.033c bāṇavarṣeṇa mahatā kruddharūpam avārayat
GE07mbh_09_u:790: 09,010.034a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ kṛpaḥ kruddho bāṇavarṣair apīḍayat 09,010.034c draupadeyāṃś ca śakunir yamau ca drauṇir abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:791: 09,010.035a duryodhano yudhāṃ śreṣṭhāv āhave keśavārjunau 09,010.035c samabhyayād ugratejāḥ śaraiś cābhyahanad balī 09,010.036a evaṃ dvaṃdvaśatāny āsaṃs tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:792: 09,010.036c ghorarūpāṇi citrāṇi tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:793: 09,010.037a ṛśyavarṇāñ jaghānāśvān bhojo bhīmasya saṃyuge 09,010.037c so 'vatīrya rathopasthād dhatāśvaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:794: 09,010.037e kālo daṇḍam ivodyamya gadāpāṇir ayudhyata 09,010.038a pramukhe sahadevasya jaghānāśvāṃś ca madrarāṭ 09,010.038c tataḥ śalyasya tanayaṃ sahadevo 'sināvadhīt
GE07mbh_09_u:795: 09,010.039a gautamaḥ punar ācāryo dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayat 09,010.039c asaṃbhrāntam asaṃbhrānto yatnavān yatnavattaram
GE07mbh_09_u:796: 09,010.040a draupadeyāṃs tathā vīrān ekaikaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:797: 09,010.040c avidhyad ācāryasuto nātikruddhaḥ smayann iva 09,010.040d*0064_01 yuktāśvasya punar madhyaṃ rathasyāroham icchataḥ 09,010.040d*0065_01 punaś ca bhīmasenasya jaghānāśvāṃs tathāhave 09,010.040d*0065_02 so 'vatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ hatāśvaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:798: 09,010.040d*0065_03 kālo daṇḍam ivodyamya gadāṃ kruddho mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:799: 09,010.040d*0065_04 pothayām āsa turagān rathaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:800: 09,010.040d*0065_05 kṛtavarmā tv avaplutya rathāt tasmād apākramat
GE07mbh_09_u:802: 09,010.041c punar eva śitair bāṇair yudhiṣṭhiram apīḍayat
GE07mbh_09_u:803: 09,010.042a tasya bhīmo raṇe kruddhaḥ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadaḥ 09,010.042c vināśāyābhisaṃdhāya gadām ādatta vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:807: 09,010.044c śaikyāṃ vyālīm ivātyugrāṃ vajrakalpām ayasmayīm 09,010.045a candanāgurupaṅkāktāṃ pramadām īpsitām iva
GE07mbh_09_u:814: 09,010.048c āhvayām āsa kaunteyaḥ saṃkruddham alakādhipam 09,010.049a yayā māyāvino dṛptān subahūn dhanadālaye 09,010.049c jaghāna guhyakān kruddho mandārārthe mahābalaḥ 09,010.049e nivāryamāṇo bahubhir draupadyāḥ priyam āsthitaḥ 09,010.050a tāṃ vajramaṇiratnaughām aṣṭāśriṃ vajragauravām
GE07mbh_09_u:815: 09,010.050c samudyamya mahābāhuḥ śalyam abhyadravad raṇe 09,010.051a gadayā yuddhakuśalas tayā dāruṇanādayā
GE07mbh_09_u:817: 09,010.052a tataḥ śalyo raṇe kruddhaḥ pīne vakṣasi tomaram
GE07mbh_09_u:818: 09,010.052c nicakhāna nadan vīro varma bhittvā ca so 'bhyagāt
GE07mbh_09_u:819: 09,010.053a vṛkodaras tv asaṃbhrātas tam evoddhṛtya tomaram
GE07mbh_09_u:820: 09,010.053b*0066_01 cikṣepa bhīmasenasya so 'sravac choṇitaṃ bahu 09,010.053b*0066_02 tam evādāya bhīmas tu tataḥ kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:821: 09,010.053c yantāraṃ madrarājasya nirbibheda tato hṛdi 09,010.054a sa bhinnavarmā rudhiraṃ vaman vitrastamānasaḥ 09,010.054c papātābhimukho dīno madrarājas tv apākramat 09,010.055a kṛtapratikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śalyo vismitamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:822: 09,010.055c gadām āśritya dhīrātmā pratyamitram avaikṣata 09,010.056a tataḥ sumanasaḥ pārthā bhīmasenam apūjayan 09,010.056b*0067_01 viyatsthitā jātaharṣās tataḥ siddhā babhāṣire 09,010.056b*0067_02 pūrvajanmani prahlādo dṛṣṭo 'smābhir ayaṃ baliḥ 09,010.056c tad dṛṣṭvā karma saṃgrāme ghoram akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:823: 09,010.056d*0068_01 taṃ dṛṣṭvā karma śalyasya sarvasiddhās tv apūjayan
GE07mbh_09_u:824: 09,011.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,011.001a patitaṃ prekṣya yantāraṃ śalyaḥ sarvāyasīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:825: 09,011.001c ādāya tarasā rājaṃs tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:826: 09,011.002a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ pāśahastam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_09_u:827: 09,011.002c saśṛṅgam iva kailāsaṃ savajram iva vāsavam
GE07mbh_09_u:828: 09,011.003a saśūlam iva haryakṣaṃ vane mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:831: 09,011.003c javenābhyapatad bhīmaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām 09,011.003d*0070_01 madrarājam asaṃbhrāntaḥ paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:832: 09,011.004a tataḥ śaṅkhapraṇādaś ca tūryāṇāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:833: 09,011.004c siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ 09,011.005a prekṣantaḥ sarvatas tau hi yodhā yodhamahādvipau
GE07mbh_09_u:834: 09,011.005c tāvakāś ca pare caiva sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan 09,011.006a na hi madrādhipād anyo rāmād vā yadunandanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:835: 09,011.006c soḍhum utsahate vegaṃ bhīmasenasya saṃyuge 09,011.007a tathā madrādhipasyāpi gadāvegaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:836: 09,011.007c soḍhum utsahate nānyo yodho yudhi vṛkodarāt
GE07mbh_09_u:837: 09,011.008a tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:840: 09,011.009c nirviśeṣam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ 09,011.010a taptahemamayaiḥ śubhrair babhūva bhayavardhanī
GE07mbh_09_u:841: 09,011.010c agnijvālair ivāviddhā paṭṭaiḥ śalyasya sā gadā
GE07mbh_09_u:842: 09,011.011a tathaiva carato mārgān maṇḍaleṣu mahātmanaḥ 09,011.011c vidyud abhrapratīkāśā bhīmasya śuśubhe gadā 09,011.012a tāḍitā madrarājena bhīmasya gadayā gadā 09,011.012c dīpyamāneva vai rājan sasṛje pāvakārciṣaḥ 09,011.013a tathā bhīmena śalyasya tāḍitā gadayā gadā
GE07mbh_09_u:843: 09,011.013c aṅgāravarṣaṃ mumuce tad adbhutam ivābhavat 09,011.014a dantair iva mahānāgau śṛṅgair iva maharṣabhau
GE07mbh_09_u:844: 09,011.014c tottrair iva tadānyonyaṃ gadāgrābhyāṃ nijaghnatuḥ 09,011.015a tau gadānihatair gātraiḥ kṣaṇena rudhirokṣitau 09,011.015c prekṣaṇīyatarāv āstāṃ puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau 09,011.016a gadayā madrarājena savyadakṣiṇam āhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:845: 09,011.016c bhīmaseno mahābāhur na cacālācalo yathā 09,011.017a tathā bhīmagadāvegais tāḍyamāno muhur muhuḥ 09,011.017c śalyo na vivyathe rājan dantinevāhato giriḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:846: 09,011.018a śuśruve dikṣu sarvāsu tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ 09,011.018c gadānipātasaṃhrādo vajrayor iva nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:847: 09,011.019a nivṛtya tu mahāvīryau samucchritagadāv ubhau 09,011.019c punar antaramārgasthau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:850: 09,011.021a prārthayānau tadānyo 'nyaṃ maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ 09,011.021c kriyāviśeṣaṃ kṛtinau darśayām āsatus tadā 09,011.022a athodyamya gade ghore saśṛṅgāv iva parvatau
GE07mbh_09_u:852: 09,011.023a tau parasparavegāc ca gadābhyāṃ ca bhṛśāhatau
GE07mbh_09_u:853: 09,011.023c yugapat petatur vīrāv ubhāv indradhvajāv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:855: 09,011.024c bhṛśaṃ marmaṇy abhihatāv ubhāv āstāṃ suvihvalau
GE07mbh_09_u:856: 09,011.025a tataḥ sagadam āropya madrāṇām ṛṣabhaṃ rathe
GE07mbh_09_u:857: 09,011.025c apovāha kṛpaḥ śalyaṃ tūrṇam āyodhanād api
GE07mbh_09_u:858: 09,011.026a kṣībavad vihvalatvāt tu nimeṣāt punar utthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:860: 09,011.027a tatas tu tāvakāḥ śūrā nānāśastrasamāyutāḥ 09,011.027c nānāvāditraśabdena pāṇḍusenām
GE07mbh_09_u:861: 09,011.028a bhujāv ucchritya śastraṃ ca śabdena mahatā tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:863: 09,011.029a tad anīkam abhiprekṣya tatas te pāṇḍunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:865: 09,011.030a teṣām āpatatāṃ tūrṇaṃ putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:866: 09,011.030c prāsena cekitānaṃ vai vivyādha hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:867: 09,011.031a sa papāta rathopasthe tava putreṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:869: 09,011.032a cekitānaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ 09,011.032c prasaktam abhyavarṣanta śaravarṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:872: 09,011.034a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca saubalaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:876: 09,011.036a trisāhasrā rathā rājaṃs tava putreṇa coditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:879: 09,011.037c prāviśaṃs tāvakā rājan haṃsā iva mahat saraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:880: 09,011.038a tato yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ parasparavadhaiṣiṇām 09,011.038c anyonyavadhasaṃyuktam anyonyaprītivardhanam 09,011.039a tasmin pravṛtte saṃgrāme rājan vīravarakṣaye 09,011.039c anileneritaṃ ghoram uttasthau pārthivaṃ rajaḥ 09,011.040a śravaṇān nāmadheyānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kīrtanāt 09,011.040c parasparaṃ vijānīmo ye cāyudhyann abhītavat 09,011.041a tad rajaḥ puruṣavyāghra śoṇitena praśāmitam 09,011.041c diśaś ca vimalā jajñus tasmin rajasi śāmite
GE07mbh_09_u:881: 09,011.042a tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme ghorarūpe bhayānake 09,011.042c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca nāsīt kaś cit parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:882: 09,011.043a brahmalokaparā bhūtvā prārthayanto jayaṃ yudhi 09,011.043c suyuddhena parākrāntā narāḥ svargam abhīpsavaḥ 09,011.044a bhartṛpiṇḍavimokṣārthaṃ bhartṛkāryaviniścitāḥ 09,011.044c svargasaṃsaktamanaso yodhā yuyudhire tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:885: 09,011.046a hata vidhyata gṛhṇīta praharadhvaṃ nikṛntata 09,011.046c iti sma vācaḥ śrūyante tava teṣāṃ ca vai bale
GE07mbh_09_u:886: 09,011.047a tataḥ śalyo mahārāja dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 09,011.047c vivyādha niśitair bāṇair hantukāmo mahāratham 09,011.048a tasya pārtho mahārāja nārācān vai caturdaśa
GE07mbh_09_u:887: 09,011.048c marmāṇy uddiśya marmajño nicakhāna hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:888: 09,011.049a taṃ vārya pāṇḍavaṃ bāṇair hantukāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:889: 09,011.049c vivyādha samare kruddho bahubhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ 09,011.050a atha bhūyo mahārāja śareṇa nataparvaṇā 09,011.050c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ samājaghne sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:892: 09,011.052a candrasenaṃ ca saptatyā sūtaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:894: 09,011.053a cakrarakṣe hate śalyaḥ pāṇḍavena mahātmanā 09,011.053c nijaghāna tato rājaṃś cedīn vai pañcaviṃśatim
GE07mbh_09_u:895: 09,011.054a sātyakiṃ pañcaviṃśatyā bhīmasenaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ 09,011.054c mādrīputrau śatenājau vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,011.055a evaṃ vicaratas tasya saṃgrāme rājasattama 09,011.055c saṃpreṣayac chitān pārthaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān 09,011.056a dhvajāgraṃ cāsya samare kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 09,011.056c pramukhe vartamānasya bhallenāpaharad rathāt
GE07mbh_09_u:896: 09,011.057a pāṇḍuputreṇa vai tasya ketuṃ chinnaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:898: 09,011.058a dhvajaṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ ca vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:900: 09,011.059a śalyaḥ sāyakavarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān 09,011.059c abhyavarṣad ameyātmā kṣatriyaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:901: 09,011.060a sātyakiṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:902: 09,011.060c ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā yudhiṣṭhiram apīḍayat 09,011.061a tato bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ vitataṃ pāṇḍavorasi 09,011.061c apaśyāma mahārāja meghajālam ivodgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:903: 09,011.062a tasya śalyo raṇe kruddho bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:904: 09,011.062c diśaḥ pracchādayām āsa pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:905: 09,011.063a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bāṇajālena pīḍitaḥ 09,011.063c babhūva hṛtavikrānto jambho vṛtrahaṇā yathā 09,012.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,012.001a pīḍite dharmarāje tu madrarājena māriṣa 09,012.001c sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:906: 09,012.001e parivārya rathaiḥ śalyaṃ pīḍayām āsur āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:907: 09,012.002a tam ekaṃ bahubhir dṛṣṭvā pīḍyamānaṃ mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:908: 09,012.002c sādhuvādo mahāñ jajñe siddhāś cāsan praharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:909: 09,012.002e āścaryam ity abhāṣanta munayaś cāpi saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:910: 09,012.003a bhīmaseno raṇe śalyaṃ śalyabhūtaṃ parākrame 09,012.003c ekena viddhvā bāṇena punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:913: 09,012.005a nakulaḥ pañcabhiś cainaṃ sahadevaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:914: 09,012.005c viddhvā taṃ tu tatas tūrṇaṃ punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ 09,012.006a sa tu śūro raṇe yattaḥ pīḍitas tair mahārathaiḥ 09,012.006c vikṛṣya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ vegaghnaṃ bhārasādhanam 09,012.007a sātyakiṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śalyo vivyādha māriṣa 09,012.007c bhīmasenaṃ trisaptatyā nakulaṃ saptabhis tathā 09,012.008a tataḥ saviśikhaṃ cāpaṃ sahadevasya dhanvinaḥ 09,012.008c chittvā bhallena samare vivyādhainaṃ trisaptabhiḥ 09,012.009a sahadevas tu samare mātulaṃ bhūrivarcasam 09,012.009c sajyam anyad dhanuḥ kṛtvā pañcabhiḥ samatāḍayat
GE07mbh_09_u:917: 09,012.010c vivyādha bhṛśasaṃkruddhas taṃ ca bhūyas tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:918: 09,012.011a bhīmasenas trisaptatyā sātyakir navabhiḥ śaraiḥ 09,012.011c dharmarājas tathā ṣaṣṭyā gātre śalyaṃ samarpayat
GE07mbh_09_u:920: 09,012.011c*0071_02 gātre bāṇais tu te sarve śūrāḥ sarve samarpayan 09,012.012a tataḥ śalyo mahārāja nirviddhas tair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:921: 09,012.012c susrāva rudhiraṃ gātrair gairikaṃ parvato yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:922: 09,012.013a tāṃś ca sarvān maheṣvāsān pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:923: 09,012.013c vivyādha tarasā rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:925: 09,012.014c dhanuś ciccheda samare sajyaṃ sa sumahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:926: 09,012.015a athānyad dhanur ādāya dharmaputro mahārathaḥ 09,012.015c sāśvasūtadhvajarathaṃ śalyaṃ prācchādayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:927: 09,012.016a sa cchādyamānaḥ samare dharmaputrasya sāyakaiḥ 09,012.016c yudhiṣṭhiram athāvidhyad daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,012.016d*0072_01 evaṃ dvaṃdvaśatāny āsaṃs tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:928: 09,012.017a sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho dharmaputre śarārdite
GE07mbh_09_u:929: 09,012.017c madrāṇām adhipaṃ śūraṃ śaraughaiḥ samavārayat 09,012.018a sa sātyakeḥ praciccheda kṣurapreṇa mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:930: 09,012.018c bhīmasenamukhāṃs tāṃś ca tribhis tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_09_u:931: 09,012.019a tasya kruddho mahārāja sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ 09,012.019c tomaraṃ preṣayām āsa svarṇadaṇḍaṃ mahādhanam 09,012.020a bhīmaseno 'tha nārācaṃ jvalantam iva pannagam
GE07mbh_09_u:932: 09,012.020c nakulaḥ samare śaktiṃ sahadevo gadāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_09_u:933: 09,012.020e dharmarājaḥ śataghnīṃ tu jighāṃsuḥ śalyam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:934: 09,012.020f*0073_01 teṣāṃ patanti śastrāṇi bahubhiḥ sāyakair yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:935: 09,012.021a tān āpatata evāśu pañcānāṃ vai bhujacyutān
GE07mbh_09_u:936: 09,012.021b*0074_01 vārayām āsa samare śastrasaṃghaiḥ sa madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_09_u:937: 09,012.021b*0075_01 ciccheda samare rājan sarveṣāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_09_u:938: 09,012.021c sātyakiprahitaṃ śalyo bhallaiś ciccheda tomaram 09,012.022a bhīmena prahitaṃ cāpi śaraṃ kanakabhūṣaṇam 09,012.022c dvidhā ciccheda samare kṛtahastaḥ pratāpavān 09,012.023a nakulapreṣitāṃ śaktiṃ hemadaṇḍāṃ bhayāvahām
GE07mbh_09_u:939: 09,012.023c gadāṃ ca sahadevena śaraughaiḥ samavārayat 09,012.024a śarābhyāṃ ca śataghnīṃ tāṃ rājñaś ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:940: 09,012.024c paśyatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca 09,012.024e nāmṛṣyat taṃ tu śaineyaḥ śatror vijayam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:941: 09,012.025a athānyad dhanur ādāya sātyakiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 09,012.025c dvābhyāṃ madreśvaraṃ viddhvā sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:942: 09,012.026a tataḥ śalyo mahārāja sarvāṃs tān daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:943: 09,012.026c vivyādha subhṛśaṃ kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipān
GE07mbh_09_u:944: 09,012.027a te vāryamāṇāḥ samare madrarājñā mahārathāḥ 09,012.027c na śekuḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ tasya śatruniṣūdanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:945: 09,012.028a tato duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā śalyasya vikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:946: 09,012.028c nihatān pāṇḍavān mene pāñcālān atha sṛñjayān
GE07mbh_09_u:948: 09,012.028d*0076_02 asahyaṃ mānavair yuddhe tad babhūva nararṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:949: 09,012.029a tato rājan mahābāhur bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān 09,012.029c saṃtyajya manasā prāṇān madrādhipam ayodhayat 09,012.030a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:950: 09,012.030c parivārya tadā śalyaṃ samantād vyakirañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:951: 09,012.031a sa caturbhir maheṣvāsaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaiḥ 09,012.031c vṛtas tān yodhayām āsa madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:952: 09,012.032a tasya dharmasuto rājan kṣurapreṇa mahāhave 09,012.032c cakrarakṣaṃ jaghānāśu madrarājasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:953: 09,012.033a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre cakrarakṣe mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:955: 09,012.034a samācchannāṃs tatas tāṃs tu rājan vīkṣya sa sainikān 09,012.034c cintayām āsa samare dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 09,012.035a kathaṃ nu na bhavet satyaṃ tan mādhavavaco mahat 09,012.035c na hi kruddho raṇe rājā kṣapayeta balaṃ mama 09,012.035d*0077_01 ahaṃ madbhrātaraś caiva sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:956: 09,012.035d*0077_02 pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāś caiva na śaktāś ca hi madrapam 09,012.035d*0077_03 nihaniṣyati ced adya mātulo 'smān mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:957: 09,012.035d*0077_04 govindavacanaṃ satyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati kiṃ tv idam
GE07mbh_09_u:961: 09,012.037c vyadhamat samare rājan mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ 09,012.038a tataḥ kanakapuṅkhāṃ tāṃ śalyakṣiptāṃ viyadgatām 09,012.038c śaravṛṣṭim apaśyāma śalabhānām ivātatim
GE07mbh_09_u:962: 09,012.039a te śarā madrarājena preṣitā raṇamūrdhani 09,012.039c saṃpatantaḥ sma dṛśyante śalabhānāṃ vrajā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:965: 09,012.041a na pāṇḍavānāṃ nāsmākaṃ tatra kaś cid vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:966: 09,012.041c bāṇāndhakāre mahati kṛte tatra mahābhaye 09,012.042a madrarājena balinā lāghavāc
GE07mbh_09_u:967: 09,012.042c loḍyamānaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ balārṇavam 09,012.042e vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur devagandharvadānavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:968: 09,012.043a sa tu tān sarvato yattāñ śaraiḥ saṃpīḍya māriṣa 09,012.043c dharmarājam avacchādya siṃhavad vyanadan muhuḥ 09,012.044a te channāḥ samare tena pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:969: 09,012.044c na śekus taṃ tadā yuddhe pratyudyātuṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:971: 09,012.045c na jahuḥ samare śūraṃ śalyam āhavaśobhinam
GE07mbh_09_u:972: 09,013.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,013.001a arjuno drauṇinā viddho yuddhe bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:973: 09,013.001c tasya cānucaraiḥ śūrais trigartānāṃ mahārathaiḥ 09,013.001e drauṇiṃ vivyādha samare tribhir eva śilīmukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:974: 09,013.002a tathetarān maheṣvāsān dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ 09,013.002c bhūyaś caiva mahābāhuḥ śaravarṣair avākirat 09,013.003a śarakaṇṭakitās te tu tāvakā bharatarṣabha 09,013.003c na jahuḥ samare pārthaṃ vadhyamānāḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:975: 09,013.004a te 'rjunaṃ rathavaṃśena droṇaputrapurogamāḥ 09,013.004c ayodhayanta samare parivārya mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:976: 09,013.004d*0078_01 parivārya mudā yuktā yodhayantaś cakāśire 09,013.005a tais tu kṣiptāḥ śarā rājan kārtasvaravibhūṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:977: 09,013.005c arjunasya rathopasthaṃ pūrayām āsur añjasā 09,013.006a tathā kṛṣṇau maheṣvāsau vṛṣabhau sarvadhanvinām 09,013.006c śarair vīkṣya vitunnāṅgau prahṛṣṭau yuddhadurmadau 09,013.007a kūbaraṃ rathacakrāṇi īṣā yoktrāṇi cābhibho 09,013.007c yugaṃ caivānukarṣaṃ ca śarabhūtam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:978: 09,013.008a naitādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ rājan naiva ca naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:979: 09,013.008c yādṛśaṃ tatra pārthasya tāvakāḥ saṃpracakrire 09,013.009a sa rathaḥ sarvato bhāti citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:980: 09,013.009c ulkāśataiḥ saṃpradīptaṃ vimānam iva bhūtale 09,013.010a tato 'rjuno mahārāja śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:981: 09,013.010c avākirat tāṃ pṛtanāṃ megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam
GE07mbh_09_u:982: 09,013.011a te vadhyamānāḥ samare pārthanāmāṅkitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,013.011c pārthabhūtam amanyanta prekṣamāṇās tathāvidham
GE07mbh_09_u:983: 09,013.012a tato 'dbhutaśarajvālo dhanuḥśabdānilo mahān 09,013.012c senendhanaṃ dadāhāśu tāvakaṃ pārthapāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:984: 09,013.013a cakrāṇāṃ patatāṃ caiva yugānāṃ ca dharātale
GE07mbh_09_u:985: 09,013.013c tūṇīrāṇāṃ patākānāṃ dhvajānāṃ ca rathaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:986: 09,013.013d*0079_01 īṣāṇāṃ cāpi yoktrāṇāṃ veṇūnāṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:987: 09,013.013d*0079_02 bhujānāṃ śirasāṃ caiva chattrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:988: 09,013.013d*0079_03 tatra kruddhasya pārthasya agamyā samabhūd dharā
GE07mbh_09_u:989: 09,013.014a īṣāṇām anukarṣāṇāṃ triveṇūnāṃ ca bhārata 09,013.014c akṣāṇām atha yoktrāṇāṃ pratodānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:991: 09,013.015c bhujānāṃ ca mahārāja skandhānāṃ ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:992: 09,013.015d*0080_01 sarveṣāṃ patatāṃ caiva chattrāṇāṃ ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:993: 09,013.016a chatrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukuṭānāṃ ca rāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:995: 09,013.016d*0081_01 tataḥ kruddhasya pārthasya rathamārge viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:999: 09,013.018a hatvā tu samare pārthaḥ sahasre dve paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:1000: 09,013.018c rathānāṃ savarūthānāṃ vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan 09,013.019a yathā hi bhagavān agnir jagad dagdhvā carācaram
GE07mbh_09_u:1001: 09,013.019c vidhūmo dṛśyate rājaṃs tathā pārtho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1002: 09,013.020a drauṇis tu samare dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavasya parākramam
GE07mbh_09_u:1004: 09,013.021a tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau śvetāśvau dhanvināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:1006: 09,013.022a tayor āsīn mahārāja bāṇavarṣaṃ sudāruṇam 09,013.022c jīmūtānāṃ yathā vṛṣṭis tapānte bharatarṣabha 09,013.023a anyonyaspardhinau tau tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 09,013.023c tatakṣatur mṛdhe 'nyonyaṃ śṛṅgābhyāṃ vṛṣabhāv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1007: 09,013.024a tayor yuddhaṃ mahārāja ciraṃ samam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:1008: 09,013.024c astrāṇāṃ saṃgamaś caiva ghoras tatrābhavan mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:1010: 09,013.025c vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhir drauṇir vivyādha bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1011: 09,013.026a tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1012: 09,013.026c mānayitvā muhūrtaṃ ca guruputraṃ mahāhave 09,013.026d*0082_01 nirucchvāsaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā guruputraṃ mahāmanāḥ 09,013.026d*0082_02 so 'sṛjat sāyakān saṃkhye arjuno jayatāṃ varaḥ 09,013.026d*0082_03 caturbhiḥ sāyakaiś caiva tāḍayām āsa ghoṭakān
GE07mbh_09_u:1014: 09,013.027c mṛdupūrvaṃ tataś cainaṃ tribhir vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1015: 09,013.028a hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan droṇaputras tv ayasmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:1019: 09,013.029c ciccheda saptadhā vīraḥ pārthaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 09,013.030a sa cchinnaṃ musalaṃ dṛṣṭvā drauṇiḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1021: 09,013.030e cikṣepa caiva pārthāya drauṇir yuddhaviśāradaḥ 09,013.031a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ parighaṃ prekṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1022: 09,013.031c arjunas tvarito jaghne pañcabhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ 09,013.032a sa cchinnaḥ patito bhūmau pārthabāṇair mahāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:1023: 09,013.032c dārayan pṛthivīndrāṇāṃ manaḥ śabdena bhārata 09,013.033a tato 'parais tribhir bāṇair drauṇiṃ vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ 09,013.033c so 'tividdho balavatā pārthena sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1024: 09,013.033e na saṃbhrāntas tadā drauṇiḥ pauruṣe sve vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1025: 09,013.034a sudharmā tu tato rājan bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:1027: 09,013.035a tatas tu suratho 'py ājau pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1029: 09,013.036a vikarṣan vai dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_09_u:1031: 09,013.037a surathaṃ tu tataḥ kruddham āpatantaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:1032: 09,013.037c cukopa samare drauṇir daṇḍāhata ivoragaḥ 09,013.038a triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā sṛkkiṇī parilelihan 09,013.038c udvīkṣya surathaṃ roṣād dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1034: 09,013.039a sa tasya hṛdayaṃ bhittvā praviveśātivegataḥ 09,013.039c śakrāśanir ivotsṛṣṭā vidārya dharaṇītalam
GE07mbh_09_u:1035: 09,013.040a tatas taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau nārācena samāhatam
GE07mbh_09_u:1036: 09,013.040c vajreṇeva yathā śṛṅgaṃ parvatasya mahādhanam 09,013.041a tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre droṇaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1037: 09,013.041c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tam eva rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1038: 09,013.042a tataḥ sajjo mahārāja drauṇir āhavadurmadaḥ 09,013.042c arjunaṃ yodhayām āsa saṃśaptakavṛto raṇe 09,013.043a tatra yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:1040: 09,013.044a tatrāścaryam apaśyāma dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ parākramam 09,013.044c yad eko yugapad vīrān samayodhayad arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1041: 09,013.045a vimardas tu mahān āsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:1042: 09,013.045c śatakrator yathā pūrvaṃ mahatyā daityasenayā 09,014.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,014.001a duryodhano mahārāja dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ 09,014.001c cakratuḥ sumahad yuddhaṃ śaraśaktisamākulam
GE07mbh_09_u:1043: 09,014.002a tayor āsan mahārāja śaradhārāḥ sahasraśaḥ 09,014.002c ambudānāṃ yathā kāle jaladhārāḥ samantataḥ 09,014.003a rājā tu pārṣataṃ viddhvā śaraiḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1044: 09,014.003c droṇahantāram ugreṣuḥ punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ 09,014.004a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu samare balavān dṛḍhavikramaḥ 09,014.004c saptatyā viśikhānāṃ vai duryodhanam apīḍayat 09,014.005a pīḍitaṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sodaryā bharatarṣabha 09,014.005c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ parivavruḥ sma pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:1045: 09,014.006a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvato 'tirathair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:1046: 09,014.006c vyacarat samare rājan darśayan hastalāghavam 09,014.007a śikhaṇḍī kṛtavarmāṇaṃ gautamaṃ ca mahāratham 09,014.007c prabhadrakaiḥ samāyukto yodhayām āsa dhanvinau 09,014.008a tatrāpi sumahad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:1048: 09,014.009a śalyas tu śaravarṣāṇi vimuñcan sarvatodiśam 09,014.009c pāṇḍavān pīḍayām āsa
GE07mbh_09_u:1049: 09,014.010a tathobhau ca yamau yuddhe yamatulyaparākramau 09,014.010c yodhayām āsa rājendra vīryeṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1051: 09,014.011c trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta ke cit tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1052: 09,014.012a tatas tu nakulaḥ śūro dharmarāje prapīḍite
GE07mbh_09_u:1054: 09,014.013a saṃchādya samare śalyaṃ nakulaḥ paravīrahā 09,014.013c vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ smayamānaḥ stanāntare 09,014.014a sarvapāraśavair bāṇaiḥ karmāraparimārjitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1056: 09,014.015a śalyas tu pīḍitas tena svasrīyeṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:1057: 09,014.015c nakulaṃ pīḍayām āsa patribhir nataparvabhiḥ 09,014.016a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmaseno 'tha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1058: 09,014.016c sahadevaś ca mādreyo madrarājam upādravan 09,014.017a tān āpatata evāśu pūrayānān rathasvanaiḥ 09,014.017c diśaś ca pradiśaś caiva kampayānāṃś ca medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:1060: 09,014.018a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1061: 09,014.018c sātyakiṃ ca śatenājau sahadevaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1062: 09,014.019a tatas tu saśaraṃ cāpaṃ nakulasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1063: 09,014.019c madreśvaraḥ kṣurapreṇa tadā ciccheda māriṣa 09,014.019e tad aśīryata vicchinnaṃ dhanuḥ śalyasya sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1064: 09,014.020a athānyad dhanur ādāya mādrīputro mahārathaḥ 09,014.020c madrarājarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ pūrayām āsa patribhiḥ 09,014.021a yudhiṣṭhiras tu madreśaṃ sahadevaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:1065: 09,014.021c daśabhir daśabhir bāṇair urasy enam avidhyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:1066: 09,014.022a bhīmasenas tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā sātyakir navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1068: 09,014.023a madrarājas tataḥ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1069: 09,014.023c vivyādha bhūyaḥ saptatyā śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām 09,014.024a athāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:1070: 09,014.024c hayāṃś ca caturaḥ saṃkhye preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_09_u:1071: 09,014.025a virathaṃ sātyakiṃ kṛtvā madrarājo mahābalaḥ 09,014.025c viśikhānāṃ śatenainam ājaghāna samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1072: 09,014.026a mādrīputrau tu saṃrabdhau bhīmasenaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:1073: 09,014.026c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kauravya vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1075: 09,014.027c yad enaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nābhyavartanta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:1076: 09,014.028a athānyaṃ ratham āsthāya sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ 09,014.028c pīḍitān pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā madrarājavaśaṃ gatān 09,014.028e abhidudrāva vegena madrāṇām adhipaṃ balī 09,014.029a āpatantaṃ rathaṃ tasya śalyaḥ samitiśobhanaḥ 09,014.029c pratyudyayau rathenaiva matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:1078: 09,014.030c sātyakeś caiva śūrasya madrāṇām adhipasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1079: 09,014.030e yādṛśo vai purā vṛttaḥ śambarāmararājayoḥ 09,014.031a sātyakiḥ prekṣya samare madrarājaṃ vyavasthitam 09,014.031c vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:1080: 09,014.032a madrarājas tu subhṛśaṃ viddhas tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:1081: 09,014.032c sātyakiṃ prativivyādha citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,014.033a tataḥ pārthā maheṣvāsāḥ sātvatābhisṛtaṃ nṛpam 09,014.033c abhyadravan rathais tūrṇaṃ mātulaṃ vadhakāmyayā 09,014.034a tata āsīt parāmardas tumulaḥ śoṇitodakaḥ 09,014.034c śūrāṇāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ siṃhānām iva nardatām 09,014.035a teṣām āsīn mahārāja vyatikṣepaḥ parasparam 09,014.035c siṃhānām āmiṣepsūnāṃ kūjatām iva saṃyuge 09,014.036a teṣāṃ bāṇasahasraughair ākīrṇā vasudhābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:1082: 09,014.036c antarikṣaṃ ca sahasā bāṇabhūtam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:1083: 09,014.037a śarāndhakāraṃ bahudhā kṛtaṃ tatra samantataḥ 09,014.037c abhracchāyeva saṃjajñe śarair muktair mahātmabhiḥ 09,014.038a tatra rājañ śarair muktair nirmuktair iva pannagaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1084: 09,014.038c svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ prakāśadbhir vyarocanta diśas tathā 09,014.039a tatrādbhutaṃ paraṃ cakre śalyaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 09,014.039c yad ekaḥ samare śūro yodhayām āsa vai bahūn 09,014.040a madrarājabhujotsṛṣṭaiḥ kaṅkabarhiṇavājitaiḥ 09,014.040c saṃpatadbhiḥ śarair ghorair avākīryata medinī 09,014.041a tatra śalyarathaṃ rājan vicarantaṃ mahāhave 09,014.041c apaśyāma yathā pūrvaṃ śakrasyāsurasaṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:1085: 09,015.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,015.001a tataḥ sainyās tava vibho madrarājapuraskṛtāḥ 09,015.001c punar abhyadravan pārthān vegena mahatā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:1086: 09,015.002a pīḍitās tāvakāḥ sarve pradhāvanto raṇotkaṭāḥ 09,015.002c kṣaṇenaiva ca pārthāṃs te bahutvāt samaloḍayan
GE07mbh_09_u:1087: 09,015.003a te vadhyamānāḥ kurubhiḥ pāṇḍavā nāvatasthire 09,015.003c nivāryamāṇā bhīmena paśyatoḥ kṛṣṇapārthayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1088: 09,015.004a tato dhanaṃjayaḥ kruddhaḥ kṛpaṃ saha padānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1089: 09,015.004c avākirac charaugheṇa kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca 09,015.005a śakuniṃ sahadevas tu sahasainyam avārayat 09,015.005c nakulaḥ pārśvataḥ sthitvā madrarājam avaikṣata 09,015.006a draupadeyā narendrāṃś ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ samavārayan 09,015.006c droṇaputraṃ ca pāñcālyaḥ śikhaṇḍī samavārayat 09,015.007a bhīmasenas tu rājānaṃ gadāpāṇir avārayat 09,015.007c śalyaṃ tu saha sainyena kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1090: 09,015.008a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ saṃsaktaṃ tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:1091: 09,015.008c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinām 09,015.009a tatra paśyāmahe karma śalyasyātimahad raṇe 09,015.009c yad ekaḥ sarvasainyāni pāṇḍavānām ayudhyata 09,015.010a vyadṛśyata tadā śalyo yudhiṣṭhirasamīpataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1093: 09,015.011a pīḍayitvā tu rājānaṃ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ 09,015.011c abhyadhāvat punar bhīmaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat 09,015.012a tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca kṛtāstratām
GE07mbh_09_u:1094: 09,015.012c apūjayann anīkāni pareṣāṃ tāvakāni ca 09,015.013a pīḍyamānās tu śalyena pāṇḍavā bhṛśavikṣatāḥ 09,015.013c prādravanta raṇaṃ hitvā krośamāne yudhiṣṭhire 09,015.014a vadhyamāneṣv anīkeṣu madrarājena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1096: 09,015.014e tataḥ pauruṣam āsthāya madrarājam apīḍayat 09,015.015a jayo vāstu vadho veti kṛtabuddhir mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1097: 09,015.015c samāhūyābravīt sarvān bhrātṝn kṛṣṇaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:1098: 09,015.016a bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca ye cānye pṛthivīkṣitaḥ 09,015.016c kauravārthe parākrāntāḥ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ gatāḥ 09,015.017a yathābhāgaṃ yathotsāhaṃ bhavantaḥ kṛtapauruṣāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1100: 09,015.018a so 'ham adya yudhā jetum āśaṃse madrakeśvaram 09,015.018c tatra yan mānasaṃ mahyaṃ tat sarvaṃ nigadāmi vaḥ 09,015.019a cakrarakṣāv imau śūrau mama mādravatīsutau 09,015.019c ajeyau vāsavenāpi samare vīrasaṃmatau
GE07mbh_09_u:1101: 09,015.020a sādhv imau mātulaṃ yuddhe kṣatradharmapuraskṛtau 09,015.020c madarthaṃ pratiyudhyetāṃ mānārhau satyasaṃgarau

GE07mbh_09_u:1104: 09,015.021c iti satyām imāṃ vāṇīṃ lokavīrā nibodhata
GE07mbh_09_u:1108: 09,015.023c saṃyuñjantu raṇe kṣipraṃ śāstravad rathayojakāḥ 09,015.024a śaineyo dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnas tathottaram 09,015.024c pṛṣṭhagopo bhavatv adya mama pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1109: 09,015.025a puraḥsaro mamādyāstu bhīmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 09,015.025c evam abhyadhikaḥ śalyād bhaviṣyāmi mahāmṛdhe 09,015.026a evam uktās tathā cakruḥ sarve rājñaḥ priyaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1110: 09,015.026c tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ punar āsīt tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:1111: 09,015.027a pāñcālānāṃ somakānāṃ matsyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ 09,015.027c pratijñāṃ tāṃ ca saṃgrāme dharmarājasya pūrayan
GE07mbh_09_u:1112: 09,015.027d*0085_01 pratijñāṃ tāṃ tadā rājā kṛtvā madreśam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1113: 09,015.028a tataḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca bherīś ca śataśaś caiva puṣkarān 09,015.028c avādayanta pāñcālāḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca nedire 09,015.029a te 'bhyadhāvanta saṃrabdhā madrarājaṃ tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1115: 09,015.030a hrādena gajaghaṇṭānāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ninadena ca 09,015.030c tūryaśabdena mahatā nādayantaś ca medinīm 09,015.031a tān pratyagṛhṇāt putras te madrarājaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1116: 09,015.031c mahāmeghān iva bahūñ śailāv astodayāv ubhau
GE07mbh_09_u:1117: 09,015.032a śalyas tu samaraślāghī dharmarājam ariṃdamam 09,015.032c vavarṣa śaravarṣeṇa varṣeṇa maghavān iva 09,015.033a tathaiva kururājo 'pi pragṛhya ruciraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1119: 09,015.033d*0086_01 saṃdadhe vividhān bāṇān darśayan hastalāghavam 09,015.034a vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1120: 09,015.034c na cāsya vivaraṃ kaś cid dadarśa carato raṇe 09,015.035a tāv ubhau vividhair bāṇais tatakṣāte parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:1122: 09,015.036a bhīmas tu tava putreṇa raṇaśauṇḍena saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1123: 09,015.036c pāñcālyaḥ sātyakiś caiva mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:1125: 09,015.037a tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ punar eva jayaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:1126: 09,015.037c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_09_u:1130: 09,015.039c papāta ruciraḥ siṃho bhīmasenasya nānadan 09,015.040a punaś cāsya dhanuś citraṃ gajarājakaropamam 09,015.040c kṣureṇa śitadhāreṇa pracakarta narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1131: 09,015.041a sa cchinnadhanvā tejasvī rathaśaktyā sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:1132: 09,015.041c bibhedorasi vikramya sa rathopastha āviśat 09,015.042a tasmin moham anuprāpte punar eva vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1133: 09,015.042c yantur eva śiraḥ kāyāt kṣurapreṇāharat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:1134: 09,015.043a hatasūtā hayās tasya ratham ādāya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1135: 09,015.043c vyadravanta diśo rājan hāhākāras tadābhavat 09,015.044a tam abhyadhāvat trāṇārthaṃ droṇaputro mahārathaḥ 09,015.044c kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca putraṃ te 'bhiparīpsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1136: 09,015.045a tasmin vilulite sainye trastās tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1137: 09,015.045c gāṇḍīvadhanvā visphārya dhanus tān ahanac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1138: 09,015.046a yudhiṣṭhiras tu madreśam abhyadhāvad amarṣitaḥ 09,015.046c svayaṃ saṃcodayann aśvān dantavarṇān manojavān 09,015.047a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma kuntīputre yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_09_u:1139: 09,015.047c purā bhūtvā mṛdur dānto yat tadā dāruṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:1140: 09,015.048a vivṛtākṣaś ca kaunteyo vepamānaś ca manyunā
GE07mbh_09_u:1141: 09,015.048c ciccheda yodhān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ 09,015.049a yāṃ yāṃ pratyudyayau senāṃ tāṃ tāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1142: 09,015.049c śarair apātayad rājan girīn vajrair ivottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1144: 09,015.050c ākrīḍad eko balavān pavanas toyadān iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1145: 09,015.051a sāśvārohāṃś ca turagān pattīṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1146: 09,015.051c vyapothayata saṃgrāme kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1147: 09,015.052a śūnyam āyodhanaṃ kṛtvā śaravarṣaiḥ samantataḥ 09,015.052c abhyadravata madreśaṃ tiṣṭha śalyeti cābravīt 09,015.053a tasya tac caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃgrāme bhīmakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1148: 09,015.053c vitresus tāvakāḥ sarve śalyas tv enaṃ samabhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1149: 09,015.054a tatas tau tu susaṃrabdhau pradhmāpya salilodbhavau
GE07mbh_09_u:1151: 09,015.055a śalyas tu śaravarṣeṇa yudhiṣṭhiram avākirat 09,015.055c madrarājaṃ ca kaunteyaḥ śaravarṣair avākirat 09,015.056a vyadṛśyetāṃ tadā rājan kaṅkapatribhir āhave 09,015.056c udbhinnarudhirau śūrau madrarājayudhiṣṭhirau
GE07mbh_09_u:1152: 09,015.057a puṣpitāv iva rejāte vane śalmalikiṃśukā 09,015.057b*0087_01 puṣpitau śuśubhāte tau vasante kiṃśukau yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:1154: 09,015.058a dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi sainyāni nādhyavasyaṃs tayor jayam
GE07mbh_09_u:1156: 09,015.059a śalyo vā pāṇḍavaṃ hatvā dadyād duryodhanāya gām
GE07mbh_09_u:1157: 09,015.059c itīva niścayo nābhūd yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1158: 09,015.060a pradakṣiṇam abhūt sarvaṃ dharmarājasya yudhyataḥ 09,015.061a tataḥ śaraśataṃ śalyo mumocāśu yudhiṣṭhire 09,015.061c dhanuś cāsya śitāgreṇa bāṇena nirakṛntata 09,015.062a so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya śalyaṃ śaraśatais tribhiḥ 09,015.062c avidhyat kārmukaṃ cāsya kṣureṇa nirakṛntata 09,015.063a athāsya nijaghānāśvāṃś caturo nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1159: 09,015.063c dvābhyām atha śitāgrābhyām ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:1162: 09,015.064e tataḥ prabhagnaṃ tat sainyaṃ dauryodhanam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_09_u:1163: 09,015.065a tato madrādhipaṃ drauṇir abhyadhāvat tathākṛtam 09,015.065c āropya cainaṃ svarathaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ pradudruve 09,015.066a muhūrtam iva tau gatvā nardamāne yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_09_u:1164: 09,015.066c sthitvā tato madrapatir anyaṃ syandanam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1168: 09,016.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,016.001a athānyad dhanur ādāya balavad vegavattaram 09,016.001c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ madrapatir viddhvā siṃha ivānadat 09,016.002a tataḥ sa śaravarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE07mbh_09_u:1170: 09,016.003a sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1171: 09,016.003c sahadevaṃ tribhir viddhvā yudhiṣṭhiram apīḍayat 09,016.004a tāṃs tān anyān maheṣvāsān sāśvān sarathakuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:1172: 09,016.004b*0089_01 ardayām āsa viśikhair ulkābhir iva kuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:1174: 09,016.004e rathāṃś ca rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ jaghāna rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1175: 09,016.005a bāhūṃś ciccheda ca tathā sāyudhān ketanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1176: 09,016.005c cakāra ca mahīṃ yodhais tīrṇāṃ vedīṃ kuśair iva 09,016.006a tathā tam arisainyāni ghnantaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakam
GE07mbh_09_u:1178: 09,016.007a taṃ bhīmasenaś ca śineś ca naptā; mādryāś ca putrau
GE07mbh_09_u:1180: 09,016.007c samāgataṃ bhīmabalena rājñā; paryāpur anyonyam athāhvayantaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1181: 09,016.008a tatas tu śūrāḥ samare narendraṃ; madreśvaraṃ prāpya yudhāṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1183: 09,016.008c āvārya cainaṃ samare nṛvīrā; jaghnuḥ śaraiḥ patribhir
GE07mbh_09_u:1185: 09,016.009a saṃrakṣito bhīmasenena rājā; mādrīsutābhyām atha mādhavena
GE07mbh_09_u:1186: 09,016.009c madrādhipaṃ patribhir ugravegaiḥ; stanāntare dharmasuto nijaghne
GE07mbh_09_u:1187: 09,016.010a tato raṇe tāvakānāṃ rathaughāḥ; samīkṣya madrādhipatiṃ śarārtam
GE07mbh_09_u:1188: 09,016.010c paryāvavruḥ pravarāḥ sarvaśaś ca; duryodhanasyānumate samantāt 09,016.011a tato drutaṃ madrajanādhipo raṇe; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ saptabhir abhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_09_u:1189: 09,016.011c taṃ cāpi pārtho navabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; vivyādha rājaṃs tumule
GE07mbh_09_u:1193: 09,016.012c anyonyam ācchādayatāṃ mahārathau; madrādhipaś cāpi yudhiṣṭhiraś ca 09,016.013a tatas tu tūrṇaṃ samare mahārathau; parasparasyāntaram īkṣamāṇau 09,016.013c śarair bhṛśaṃ vivyadhatur nṛpottamau; mahābalau śatrubhir apradhṛṣyau
GE07mbh_09_u:1196: 09,016.014c parasparaṃ bāṇagaṇair mahātmanoḥ; pravarṣator madrapapāṇḍuvīrayoḥ 09,016.015a tau ceratur vyāghraśiśuprakāśau; mahāvaneṣv āmiṣagṛddhināv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1197: 09,016.015c viṣāṇinau nāgavarāv ivobhau; tatakṣatuḥ saṃyugajātadarpau 09,016.016a tatas tu madrādhipatir mahātmā; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmabalaṃ prasahya
GE07mbh_09_u:1198: 09,016.016c vivyādha vīraṃ hṛdaye 'tivegaṃ; śareṇa sūryāgnisamaprabheṇa 09,016.017a tato 'tividdho 'tha yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi; susaṃprayuktena śareṇa rājan
GE07mbh_09_u:1201: 09,016.017c jaghāna madrādhipatiṃ mahātmā; mudaṃ ca lebhe ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām 09,016.018a tato muhūrtād iva pārthivendro; labdhvā saṃjñāṃ krodhasaṃraktanetraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1203: 09,016.019a tvaraṃs tato dharmasuto mahātmā; śalyasya kruddho navabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1205: 09,016.019c bhittvā hy uras tapanīyaṃ ca varma; jaghāna ṣaḍbhis tv aparaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ 09,016.020a tatas tu madrādhipatiḥ prahṛṣṭo; dhanur vikṛṣya vyasṛjat
GE07mbh_09_u:1207: 09,016.020c dvābhyāṃ kṣurābhyāṃ ca tathaiva rājñaś; ciccheda cāpaṃ kurupuṃgavasya
GE07mbh_09_u:1208: 09,016.021a navaṃ tato 'nyat samare pragṛhya; rājā dhanur ghorataraṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1210: 09,016.021c śalyaṃ tu viddhvā niśitaiḥ samantād; yathā mahendro namuciṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1212: 09,016.022a tatas tu śalyo navabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; bhīmasya rājñaś ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1214: 09,016.022c nikṛtya raukme paṭuvarmaṇī tayor; vidārayām āsa bhujau mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:1215: 09,016.023a tato 'pareṇa jvalitārkatejasā; kṣureṇa rājño dhanur unmamātha
GE07mbh_09_u:1216: 09,016.023c kṛpaś ca tasyaiva jaghāna sūtaṃ; ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ so 'bhimukhaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1218: 09,016.024a madrādhipaś cāpi yudhiṣṭhirasya; śaraiś caturbhir nijaghāna
GE07mbh_09_u:1220: 09,016.024c vāhāṃś ca hatvā vyakaron mahātmā; yodhakṣayaṃ dharmasutasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1221: 09,016.024d*0091_01 yad adbhutaṃ karma na śakyam anyaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1226: 09,016.024d*0091_06 moghaṃ bhavaty adya vidher balena 09,016.024d*0091_07 jahīti śalyaṃ hy avadat tadājau 09,016.024d*0091_08 na lokanāthasya vaco 'nyathā syāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1227: 09,016.025a tathā kṛte rājani bhīmaseno; madrādhipasyāśu tato mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:1228: 09,016.025c chittvā dhanur vegavatā śareṇa; dvābhyām avidhyat subhṛśaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1230: 09,016.026a athāpareṇāsya jahāra yantuḥ; kāyāc chiraḥ saṃnahanīyamadhyāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1231: 09,016.026c jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaḥ sa śīghraṃ; tathā bhṛśaṃ kupito
GE07mbh_09_u:1233: 09,016.027a tam agraṇīḥ sarvadhanurdharāṇām; ekaṃ carantaṃ samare 'tivegam
GE07mbh_09_u:1234: 09,016.027c bhīmaḥ śatena vyakirac charāṇāṃ; mādrīputraḥ sahadevas tathaiva
GE07mbh_09_u:1235: 09,016.028a taiḥ sāyakair mohitaṃ vīkṣya śalyaṃ; bhīmaḥ śarair asya
GE07mbh_09_u:1236: cakarta varma 09,016.028b*0092_01 bhīmaḥ śarair niśitais tigmatejaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1238: 09,016.028c sa bhīmasenena nikṛttavarmā; madrādhipaś carma sahasratāram
GE07mbh_09_u:1239: 09,016.029a pragṛhya khaḍgaṃ ca rathān mahātmā; praskandya kuntīsutam abhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_09_u:1240: 09,016.029c chittvā ratheṣāṃ nakulasya so 'tha; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmabalo 'bhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_09_u:1241: 09,016.030a taṃ cāpi rājānam athotpatantaṃ; kruddhaṃ yathaivāntakam āpatantam
GE07mbh_09_u:1242: 09,016.030c dhṛṣṭadyumno draupadeyāḥ śikhaṇḍī; śineś ca naptā sahasā parīyuḥ 09,016.031a athāsya carmāpratimaṃ nyakṛntad; bhīmo mahātmā daśabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1244: 09,016.031c khaḍgaṃ ca bhallair nicakarta muṣṭau; nadan prahṛṣṭas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:1246: 09,016.032a tat karma bhīmasya samīkṣya hṛṣṭās; te pāṇḍavānāṃ pravarā
GE07mbh_09_u:1248: 09,016.032c nādaṃ ca cakrur bhṛśam utsmayantaḥ; śaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1250: 09,016.033a tenātha śabdena vibhīṣaṇena; tavābhitaptaṃ balam aprahṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_09_u:1253: 09,016.034a sa madrarājaḥ sahasāvakīrṇo; bhīmāgragaiḥ pāṇḍavayodhamukhyaiḥ 09,016.034c yudhiṣṭhirasyābhimukhaṃ javena; siṃho yathā mṛgahetoḥ prayātaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1254: 09,016.035a sa dharmarājo nihatāśvasūtaṃ; krodhena dīptajvalanaprakāśam 09,016.035c dṛṣṭvā tu madrādhipatiṃ sa tūrṇaṃ; samabhyadhāvat tam ariṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1256: 09,016.036a govindavākyaṃ tvaritaṃ vicintya; dadhre matiṃ śalyavināśanāya
GE07mbh_09_u:1257: 09,016.036c sa dharmarājo nihatāśvasūte; rathe tiṣṭhañ śaktim
GE07mbh_09_u:1259: 09,016.037a tac cāpi śalyasya niśamya karma; mahātmano bhāgam athāvaśiṣṭam
GE07mbh_09_u:1260: 09,016.037c smṛtvā manaḥ śalyavadhe yatātmā; yathoktam indrāvarajasya cakre
GE07mbh_09_u:1261: 09,016.038a sa dharmarājo maṇihemadaṇḍāṃ; jagrāha śaktiṃ kanakaprakāśām
GE07mbh_09_u:1262: 09,016.038c netre ca dīpte sahasā vivṛtya; madrādhipaṃ kruddhamanā niraikṣat
GE07mbh_09_u:1263: 09,016.039a nirīkṣito vai naradeva rājñā; pūtātmanā nirhṛtakalmaṣeṇa 09,016.039c abhūn na yad bhasmasān madrarājas; tad adbhutaṃ me pratibhāti rājan 09,016.040a tatas tu śaktiṃ rucirogradaṇḍāṃ; maṇipravālojjvalitāṃ pradīptām 09,016.040c cikṣepa vegāt subhṛśaṃ mahātmā; madrādhipāya pravaraḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:1264: 09,016.041a dīptām athaināṃ mahatā balena; savisphuliṅgāṃ sahasā patantīm
GE07mbh_09_u:1265: 09,016.041c praikṣanta sarve kuravaḥ sametā; yathā yugānte mahatīm ivolkām
GE07mbh_09_u:1266: 09,016.042a tāṃ kālarātrīm iva pāśahastāṃ; yamasya dhātrīm iva cograrūpām
GE07mbh_09_u:1267: 09,016.042c sabrahmadaṇḍapratimām amoghāṃ; sasarja yatto yudhi dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1270: 09,016.044a īśānahetoḥ pratinirmitāṃ tāṃ; tvaṣṭrā ripūṇām asudehabhakṣām
GE07mbh_09_u:1272: 09,016.045a ghaṇṭāpatākāmaṇivajrabhājaṃ; vaiḍūryacitrāṃ tapanīyadaṇḍām 09,016.045c tvaṣṭrā prayatnān niyamena kḷptāṃ; brahmadviṣām antakarīm amoghām
GE07mbh_09_u:1275: 09,016.046c sasarja mārgeṇa ca tāṃ pareṇa; vadhāya madrādhipates tadānīm
GE07mbh_09_u:1278: 09,016.047c prasārya bāhuṃ sudṛḍhaṃ supāṇiṃ; krodhena nṛtyann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1280: 09,016.047d*0093_01 sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalam aṃśujālair 09,016.047d*0093_02 dharmātmajo madravināśakāle 09,016.047d*0093_03 puratrayaproddharaṇe purastān 09,016.047d*0093_04 māheśvaraṃ rūpam abhūt tadānīm
GE07mbh_09_u:1282: 09,016.047d*0093_06 saṃdhyāvihārī tanuvṛttamadhyaḥ 09,016.047d*0093_07 viśālavakṣā bhagavān haro yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:1288: 09,016.049a sā tasya marmāṇi vidārya śubhram; uro viśālaṃ ca tathaiva varma 09,016.049c viveśa gāṃ toyam ivāprasaktā; yaśo viśālaṃ nṛpater dahantī
GE07mbh_09_u:1290: 09,016.050c saṃsiktagātro rudhireṇa so 'bhūt; krauñco yathā skandahato
GE07mbh_09_u:1292: 09,016.051a prasārya bāhū sa rathād gato gāṃ; saṃchinnavarmā kurunandanena 09,016.051c mahendravāhapratimo mahātmā; vajrāhataṃ śṛṅgam ivācalasya
GE07mbh_09_u:1296: 09,016.052c tato nipatito bhūmāv indradhvaja ivocchritaḥ 09,016.053a sa tathā bhinnasarvāṅgo rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ 09,016.053c pratyudgata iva premṇā bhūmyā sa narapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1297: 09,016.054a priyayā kāntayā kāntaḥ patamāna ivorasi 09,016.054c ciraṃ bhuktvā vasumatīṃ priyāṃ kāntām iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1298: 09,016.054e sarvair aṅgaiḥ samāśliṣya prasupta iva so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:1299: 09,016.055a dharmye dharmātmanā yuddhe nihato dharmasūnunā 09,016.055c samyag ghuta iva sviṣṭaḥ praśānto 'gnir ivādhvare
GE07mbh_09_u:1301: 09,016.056c saṃśāntam api madreśaṃ lakṣmīr naiva vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_09_u:1303: 09,016.057c vyadhamad dviṣataḥ saṃkhye khagarāḍ iva pannagān
GE07mbh_09_u:1304: 09,016.057e dehāsūn niśitair bhallai ripūṇāṃ nāśayan kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1305: 09,016.058a tataḥ pārthasya bāṇaughair āvṛtāḥ sainikās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:1306: 09,016.058c nimīlitākṣāḥ kṣiṇvanto bhṛśam anyonyam arditāḥ 09,016.058e saṃnyastakavacā dehair vipatrāyudhajīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1307: 09,016.059a tataḥ śalye nipatite madrarājānujo yuvā 09,016.059c bhrātuḥ sarvair guṇais tulyo rathī pāṇḍavam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1308: 09,016.060a vivyādha ca naraśreṣṭho nārācair bahubhis tvaran
GE07mbh_09_u:1310: 09,016.061a taṃ vivyādhāśugaiḥ ṣaḍbhir dharmarājas tvarann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1311: 09,016.061c kārmukaṃ cāsya ciccheda kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1314: 09,016.062d*0095_01 śiraś ciccheda bāṇena bhallena nataparvaṇā 09,016.063a sakuṇḍalaṃ tad dadṛśe patamānaṃ śiro rathāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1315: 09,016.063c puṇyakṣayam iva prāpya patantaṃ svargavāsinam 09,016.064a tasyāpakṛṣṭaśīrṣaṃ tac charīraṃ patitaṃ rathāt 09,016.064c rudhireṇāvasiktāṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā sainyam abhajyata
GE07mbh_09_u:1318: 09,016.066a śalyānujaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakās tyaktajīvitāḥ 09,016.066c vitresuḥ pāṇḍavabhayād rajodhvastās tathā bhṛśam 09,016.067a tāṃs tathā bhajyatas trastān kauravān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:1319: 09,016.067b*0096_01 tat sainyaṃ tava putrasya vidrutaṃ sarvato bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1320: 09,016.067c śiner naptā kiran bāṇair abhyavartata sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1321: 09,016.068a tam āyāntaṃ maheṣvāsam aprasahyaṃ durāsadam 09,016.068c hārdikyas tvarito rājan pratyagṛhṇād abhītavat 09,016.069a tau sametau mahātmānau vārṣṇeyāv aparājitau 09,016.069c hārdikyaḥ sātyakiś caiva siṃhāv iva madotkaṭau
GE07mbh_09_u:1325: 09,016.071c ākāśe samapaśyāma pataṃgān iva śīghragān 09,016.072a sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā hayāṃś cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1326: 09,016.072c cāpam ekena ciccheda hārdikyo nataparvaṇā 09,016.073a tan nikṛttaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭham apāsya śinipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1327: 09,016.073c anyad ādatta vegena vegavattaram āyudham 09,016.074a tad ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:1328: 09,016.074c hārdikyaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare 09,016.075a tato rathaṃ yugeṣāṃ ca chittvā bhallaiḥ susaṃyataiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1329: 09,016.075c aśvāṃs tasyāvadhīt tūrṇam ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:1330: 09,016.075d*0097_01 hārdikyaṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:1331: 09,016.075d*0097_02 apovāha tataḥ kṣipraṃ ratham āropya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1332: 09,016.076a madrarāje hate rājan virathe kṛtavarmaṇi 09,016.076c duryodhanabalaṃ sarvaṃ punar āsīt parāṅmukham 09,016.077a tatpare nāvabudhyanta sainyena rajasā vṛte 09,016.077c balaṃ tu hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ tat tadāsīt parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_09_u:1333: 09,016.078a tato muhūrtāt te 'paśyan rajo bhaumaṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:1335: 09,016.078d*0098_01 vividhān saritaś coghāñ śoṇitasya viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_09_u:1344: 09,016.083a aśvatthāmā tato rājñā hatāśvaṃ virathīkṛtam 09,016.083c samapovāha hārdikyaṃ svarathena yudhiṣṭhirāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1345: 09,016.084a tataḥ śāradvato 'ṣṭābhiḥ pratyavidhyad yudhiṣṭhiram 09,016.084c vivyādha cāśvān niśitais tasyāṣṭābhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ 09,016.085a evam etan mahārāja yuddhaśeṣam avartata 09,016.085c tava durmantrite rājan sahaputrasya bhārata 09,016.086a tasmin maheṣvāsavare viśaste; saṃgrāmamadhye kurupuṃgavena 09,016.086c pārthāḥ sametāḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ; śaṅkhān pradadhmur hatam

GE07mbh_09_u:1352: 09,017.003a duryodhanena te vīrā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1353: 09,017.003c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ jighāṃsantaḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ prāviśan balam 09,017.004a te tu śūrā mahārāja kṛtacittāḥ sma yodhane

GE07mbh_09_u:1356: 09,017.006a ājagāma tataḥ pārtho gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1357: 09,017.006c pūrayan rathaghoṣeṇa diśaḥ sarvā mahārathaḥ 09,017.007a tato 'rjunaś ca bhīmaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:1358: 09,017.007c sātyakiś ca naravyāghro draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1359: 09,017.008a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca pāñcālāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1361: 09,017.009a te samantāt parivṛtāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ 09,017.009c kṣobhayanti sma tāṃ senāṃ makarāḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:1363: 09,017.010c akṣobhyata tadā rājan pāṇḍūnāṃ dhvajinī punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1364: 09,017.011a praskandya senāṃ mahatīṃ tyaktātmāno mahārathāḥ 09,017.011c vṛkṣān iva mahāvātāḥ kampayanti sma tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1365: 09,017.012a bahavaś cukruśus tatra kva sa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1366: 09,017.012c bhrātaro vāsya te śūrā dṛśyante neha ke cana 09,017.013a pāñcālānāṃ mahāvīryāḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ 09,017.013c dhṛṣṭadyumno 'tha śaineyo draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1367: 09,017.014a evaṃ tān vādinaḥ śūrān draupadeyā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1369: 09,017.015a cakrair vimathitaiḥ ke cit ke cic chinnair mahādhvajaiḥ 09,017.015c pratyadṛśyanta samare tāvakā nihatāḥ paraiḥ 09,017.016a ālokya pāṇḍavān yuddhe yodhā rājan samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1370: 09,017.016c vāryamāṇā yayur vegāt tava putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1371: 09,017.017a duryodhanas tu tān vīrān vārayām āsa sāntvayan
GE07mbh_09_u:1372: 09,017.017c na cāsya śāsanaṃ kaś cit tatra cakre mahārathaḥ 09,017.018a tato gāndhārarājasya putraḥ śakunir abravīt 09,017.018c duryodhanaṃ mahārāja vacanaṃ vacanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1373: 09,017.019a kiṃ naḥ saṃprekṣamāṇānāṃ madrāṇāṃ hanyate balam
GE07mbh_09_u:1374: 09,017.019c na yuktam etat samare tvayi tiṣṭhati bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1375: 09,017.020a sahitair nāma yoddhavyam ity eṣa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1376: 09,017.020c atha kasmāt parān eva ghnato marṣayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:1377: 09,017.021 duryodhana uvāca 09,017.021a vāryamāṇā mayā pūrvaṃ naite cakrur vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:1378: 09,017.021c ete hi nihatāḥ sarve praskannāḥ pāṇḍuvāhinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:1379: 09,017.022 śakunir uvāca 09,017.022*0100_01 vāryamāṇo (sic) mayā pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ vacanaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1380: 09,017.022a na bhartuḥ śāsanaṃ vīrā raṇe kurvanty amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1381: 09,017.022c alaṃ kroddhuṃ tathaiteṣāṃ nāyaṃ kāla upekṣitum
GE07mbh_09_u:1382: 09,017.023a yāmaḥ sarve 'tra saṃbhūya savājirathakuñjarāḥ 09,017.023c paritrātuṃ maheṣvāsān
GE07mbh_09_u:1383: 09,017.024a anyonyaṃ parirakṣāmo yatnena mahatā nṛpa 09,017.024c evaṃ sarve 'nusaṃcintya prayayur yatra sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1384: 09,017.025 saṃjaya uvāca 09,017.025a evam uktas tato rājā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1385: 09,017.025c prayayau siṃhanādena kampayan vai vasuṃdharām 09,017.026a hata vidhyata gṛhṇīta praharadhvaṃ nikṛntata 09,017.026c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdas tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1386: 09,017.027a pāṇḍavās tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā madrarājapadānugān 09,017.027b*0101_01 paśyatāṃ tava putrāṇāṃ pāṇḍuputrair asaṃbhramam 09,017.027c sahitān abhyavartanta gulmam āsthāya madhyamam 09,017.028a te muhūrtād raṇe vīrā hastāhastaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:1388: 09,017.029a tato naḥ saṃprayātānāṃ hatāmitrās tarasvinaḥ 09,017.029c hṛṣṭāḥ kilakilāśabdam akurvan sahitāḥ pare 09,017.030a athotthitāni ruṇḍāni samadṛśyanta sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1390: 09,017.031a rathair bhagnair yugākṣaiś ca nihataiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1391: 09,017.031c aśvair nipatitaiś caiva saṃchannābhūd vasuṃdharā 09,017.032a vātāyamānais turagair yugāsaktais turaṃgamaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1392: 09,017.032c adṛśyanta mahārāja yodhās tatra raṇājire 09,017.033a bhagnacakrān rathān ke cid avahaṃs turagā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:1393: 09,017.033c rathārdhaṃ ke cid ādāya diśo daśa vibabhramuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1394: 09,017.033e tatra tatra ca dṛśyante yoktraiḥ śliṣṭāḥ sma vājinaḥ 09,017.034a rathinaḥ patamānāś ca vyadṛśyanta narottama 09,017.034c gaganāt pracyutāḥ siddhāḥ puṇyānām iva saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:1395: 09,017.035a nihateṣu ca śūreṣu madrarājānugeṣu ca 09,017.035c asmān āpatataś cāpi dṛṣṭvā pārthā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1398: 09,017.037a asmāṃs tu punar āsādya labdhalakṣāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1400: 09,017.038a tato hatam abhiprekṣya madrarājabalaṃ mahat 09,017.038c madrarājaṃ ca samare dṛṣṭvā śūraṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:1401: 09,017.038e duryodhanabalaṃ sarvaṃ punar āsīt parāṅmukham 09,017.039a vadhyamānaṃ mahārāja pāṇḍavair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1403: 09,018.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,018.001a pātite yudhi durdharṣe madrarāje mahārathe 09,018.001c tāvakās tava putrāś ca prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_09_u:1405: 09,018.002c apāre pāram icchanto hate śūre mahātmani
GE07mbh_09_u:1407: 09,018.003c anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1408: 09,018.004a vṛṣā yathā bhagnaśṛṅgāḥ śīrṇadantā gajā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1410: 09,018.005a na saṃdhātum anīkāni na ca rājan parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:1411: 09,018.005c āsīd buddhir hate śalye tava yodhasya kasya cit 09,018.006a bhīṣme droṇe ca nihate sūtaputre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1412: 09,018.006c yad duḥkhaṃ tava yodhānāṃ bhayaṃ cāsīd viśāṃ pate 09,018.006e tad bhayaṃ sa ca naḥ śoko bhūya evābhyavartata 09,018.007a nirāśāś ca jaye tasmin hate śalye mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:1413: 09,018.007b*0102_01 nirāśaś ca hate śalye rājā rājan mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1414: 09,018.007c hatapravīrā vidhvastā vikṛttāś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1415: 09,018.007e madrarāje hate rājan yodhās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1416: 09,018.008a aśvān anye gajān anye rathān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1417: 09,018.008c āruhya javasaṃpannāḥ pādātāḥ prādravan bhayāt 09,018.009a dvisāhasrāś ca mātaṅgā girirūpāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 09,018.009c saṃprādravan hate śalye aṅkuśāṅguṣṭhacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1418: 09,018.010a te raṇād bharataśreṣṭha tāvakāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1419: 09,018.010c dhāvantaś cāpy adṛśyanta śvasamānāḥ śarāturāḥ 09,018.011a tān prabhagnān drutān dṛṣṭvā hatotsāhān parājitān
GE07mbh_09_u:1420: 09,018.011c abhyadravanta pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ 09,018.012a bāṇaśabdaravaś cāpi siṃhanādaś ca puṣkalaḥ 09,018.012c śaṅkhaśabdaś ca śūrāṇāṃ dāruṇaḥ samapadyata 09,018.013a dṛṣṭvā tu kauravaṃ sainyaṃ bhayatrastaṃ pravidrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:1421: 09,018.013c anyonyaṃ samabhāṣanta pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha 09,018.014a adya rājā satyadhṛtir jitāmitro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 09,018.014c adya duryodhano hīno dīptayā nṛpatiśriyā 09,018.014d*0103_01 adya diṣṭyā kṣmāśayanaṃ niratāmāmucakṣuṣaḥ (sic)
GE07mbh_09_u:1422: 09,018.014d*0103_02 draupadyā yaś ca saṃkalpaḥ saṃsiddha iti ghuṣyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:1423: 09,018.015a adya śrutvā hataṃ putraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:1425: 09,018.017a adyaprabhṛti pārthāṃś ca preṣyabhūta upācaran 09,018.017b*0104_01 adyaiva ca hi pārthānāṃ yat kṛtaṃ pūrvakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1426: 09,018.017c vijānātu nṛpo duḥkhaṃ yat prāptaṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1427: 09,018.018a adya kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ jānātu sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1429: 09,018.018d*0105_01 putrāṇāṃ ca vadhaṃ ghoraṃ bhīmena śroṣyate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1430: 09,018.019a astrāṇāṃ ca balaṃ sarvaṃ bāhvoś ca balam āhave 09,018.019c adya jñāsyati bhīmasya balaṃ ghoraṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1431: 09,018.020a hate duryodhane yuddhe śakreṇevāsure maye 09,018.020c yat kṛtaṃ bhīmasenena duḥśāsanavadhe tadā 09,018.020e nānyaḥ kartāsti loke tad ṛte bhīmaṃ mahābalam

GE07mbh_09_u:1433: 09,018.022a adya jñāsyati saṃgrāme mādrīputrau mahābalau 09,018.022c nihate saubale śūre gāndhāreṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1434: 09,018.023a kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ 09,018.023c sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1435: 09,018.024a draupadyās tanayāḥ pañca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:1436: 09,018.024c śikhaṇḍī ca maheṣvāso rājā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1437: 09,018.025a yeṣāṃ ca jagatāṃ nātho nāthaḥ kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1438: 09,018.025c kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ 09,018.025d*0106_01 lābhas teṣāṃ jayas teṣāṃ kutas teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1439: 09,018.025d*0106_02 yeṣāṃ nātho hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvalokavibhur hariḥ 09,018.026a bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca madrarājānam eva ca 09,018.026c tathānyān nṛpatīn vīrāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1440: 09,018.027a ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetum ṛte pārthaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:1441: 09,018.027c yasya nātho hṛṣīkeśaḥ sadā dharmayaśonidhiḥ 09,018.028a ity evaṃ vadamānās te harṣeṇa mahatā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1444: 09,018.029c mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1445: 09,018.030a tān prekṣya dravataḥ sarvān bhīmasenabhayārditān 09,018.030c duryodhanas tadā sūtam abravīd utsmayann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:1446: 09,018.031a na mātikramate pārtho dhanuṣpāṇim avasthitam 09,018.031c jaghane sarvasainyānāṃ mamāśvān pratipādaya
GE07mbh_09_u:1447: 09,018.032a jaghane yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1449: 09,018.033a paśya sainyaṃ mahat sūta pāṇḍavaiḥ samabhidrutam

GE07mbh_09_u:1452: 09,018.034c tasmād yāhi śanaiḥ sūta jaghanaṃ paripālaya
GE07mbh_09_u:1453: 09,018.035a mayi sthite ca samare niruddheṣu ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:1454: 09,018.035c punarāvartate tūrṇaṃ māmakaṃ balam ojasā 09,018.036a tac chrutvā tava putrasya śūrāgryasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1455: 09,018.036c sārathir hemasaṃchannāñ śanair aśvān acodayat 09,018.037a gajāśvarathibhir hīnās tyaktātmānaḥ padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1456: 09,018.037c ekaviṃśatisāhasrāḥ saṃyugāyāvatasthire 09,018.038a nānādeśasamudbhūtā nānārañjitavāsasaḥ 09,018.038c avasthitās tadā yodhāḥ prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1457: 09,018.039a teṣām āpatatāṃ tatra saṃhṛṣṭānāṃ parasparam 09,018.039c saṃmardaḥ sumahāñ jajñe ghorarūpo bhayānakaḥ 09,018.040a bhīmasenaṃ tadā rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:1459: 09,018.041a bhīmam evābhyavartanta raṇe 'nye tu padātayaḥ 09,018.041c prakṣveḍyāsphoṭya saṃhṛṣṭā vīralokaṃ yiyāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1460: 09,018.042a āsādya bhīmasenaṃ tu saṃrabdhā yuddhadurmadāḥ 09,018.042c dhārtarāṣṭrā vinedur hi nānyāṃ cākathayan kathām
GE07mbh_09_u:1461: 09,018.042d*0107_01 nigṛhītuṃ tadā kruddhāḥ samantāt paryavārayan 09,018.042e parivārya raṇe bhīmaṃ nijaghnus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1463: 09,018.043c na cacāla rathopasthe maināka iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1464: 09,018.044a te tu kruddhā mahārāja pāṇḍavasya mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:1465: 09,018.044c nigrahītuṃ pracakrur hi yodhāṃś cānyān avārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:1466: 09,018.045a akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tais tadā paryavasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1469: 09,018.046c avadhīt tāvakān yodhān daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ 09,018.047a rathāśvadvipahīnāṃs tu tān bhīmo gadayā balī
GE07mbh_09_u:1470: 09,018.047b*0108_01 viprahīnarathāśvāṃs tān narān sa puruṣarṣabhaḥ 09,018.047b*0109_01 bhīmaseno gadāpāṇir gadayā vajrakalpayā
GE07mbh_09_u:1472: 09,018.048a hatvā tat puruṣānīkaṃ bhīmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 09,018.048c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ puraskṛtya nacirāt pratyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:1473: 09,018.049a pādātā nihatā bhūmau śiśyire rudhirokṣitāḥ 09,018.049c saṃbhagnā iva vātena karṇikārāḥ supuṣpitāḥ 09,018.050a nānāpuṣpasrajopetā nānākuṇḍaladhāriṇaḥ 09,018.050c nānājātyā hatās tatra nānādeśasamāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1475: 09,018.051c nikṛttaṃ vibabhau tatra ghorarūpaṃ bhayānakam 09,018.052a yudhiṣṭhirapurogās tu sarvasainyamahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1476: 09,018.052c abhyadhāvan mahātmānaṃ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava 09,018.053a te sarve tāvakān dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsān parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_09_u:1478: 09,018.053c nābhyavartanta te putraṃ veleva makarālayam 09,018.054a tad adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam
GE07mbh_09_u:1479: 09,018.054c yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:1481: 09,018.055c duryodhanaḥ svakaṃ sainyam abravīd bhṛśavikṣatam 09,018.056a na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
GE07mbh_09_u:1482: 09,018.056c yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1483: 09,018.057a alpaṃ ca balam eteṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:1484: 09,018.057c yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet 09,018.058a viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:1485: 09,018.058c anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:1486: 09,018.059a śṛṇudhvaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1487: 09,018.059c yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca mārayaty antakaḥ sadā 09,018.059e ko nu mūḍho na yudhyeta puruṣaḥ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1488: 09,018.060a śreyo no bhīmasenasya kruddhasya pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:1489: 09,018.060c sukhaḥ sāṃgrāmiko mṛtyuḥ kṣatradharmeṇa yudhyatām 09,018.060d*0111_01 martyenāvaśyamartavyaṃ gṛheṣv api kadā cana 09,018.060d*0111_02 yudhyataḥ kṣatradharmeṇa mṛtyur eṣa sanātanaḥ 09,018.060e jitveha sukham āpnoti hataḥ pretya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:1490: 09,018.061a na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1491: 09,018.061c acireṇa jitāṃl lokān hato yuddhe samaśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:1492: 09,018.062a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pūjayitvā ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1494: 09,018.063a tān āpatata evāśu vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 09,018.063c pratyudyayus tadā pārthā jayagṛdhrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ 09,018.064a dhanaṃjayo rathenājāv abhyavartata vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1495: 09,018.064c viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1496: 09,018.065a mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1497: 09,018.065c javenābhyapatan hṛṣṭā yato vai tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_09_u:1498: 09,019.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,019.001a saṃnivṛtte balaughe tu śālvo mlecchagaṇādhipaḥ 09,019.001c abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ sumahad balam 09,019.002a āsthāya sumahānāgaṃ prabhinnaṃ parvatopamam
GE07mbh_09_u:1504: 09,019.004a tam āsthito rājavaro babhūva; yathodayasthaḥ savitā kṣapānte
GE07mbh_09_u:1505: 09,019.004c sa tena nāgapravareṇa rājann; abhyudyayau pāṇḍusutān samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1506: 09,019.004e śitaiḥ pṛṣatkair vidadāra cāpi; mahendravajrapratimaiḥ sughoraiḥ 09,019.005a tataḥ śarān vai sṛjato mahāraṇe; yodhāṃś ca rājan nayato yamāya 09,019.005b*0113_01 tataḥ śarān vai sṛ[ja]tā nṛpeṇa
GE07mbh_09_u:1508: 09,019.005c nāsyāntaraṃ dadṛśuḥ sve pare vā; yathā purā vajradharasya
GE07mbh_09_u:1511: 09,019.006a te pāṇḍavāḥ somakāḥ sṛñjayāś ca; tam eva nāgaṃ dadṛśuḥ samantāt 09,019.006c sahasraśo vai vicarantam ekaṃ; yathā mahendrasya gajaṃ samīpe
GE07mbh_09_u:1512: 09,019.007a saṃdrāvyamāṇaṃ tu balaṃ pareṣāṃ; parītakalpaṃ vibabhau samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1513: 09,019.007c naivāvatasthe samare bhṛśaṃ bhayād; vimardamānaṃ tu parasparaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1515: 09,019.008a tataḥ prabhagnā sahasā mahācamūḥ; sā pāṇḍavī tena narādhipena
GE07mbh_09_u:1516: 09,019.008c diśaś catasraḥ sahasā pradhāvitā; gajendravegaṃ tam apārayantī
GE07mbh_09_u:1517: 09,019.009a dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ vegavatā prabhagnāṃ; sarve tvadīyā yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:1519: 09,019.009c apūjayaṃs tatra narādhipaṃ taṃ; dadhmuś ca śaṅkhāñ
GE07mbh_09_u:1521: 09,019.010a śrutvā ninādaṃ tv atha kauravāṇāṃ; harṣād vimuktaṃ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:1523: 09,019.010c senāpatiḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayānāṃ; pāñcālaputro na mamarṣa roṣāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1524: 09,019.011a tatas tu taṃ vai dviradaṃ mahātmā; pratyudyayau tvaramāṇo jayāya
GE07mbh_09_u:1525: 09,019.011c jambho yathā śakrasamāgame vai; nāgendram airāvaṇam indravāhyam
GE07mbh_09_u:1526: 09,019.012a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā tu dṛṣṭvā; pāñcālarājaṃ yudhi rājasiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1527: 09,019.012c taṃ vai dvipaṃ preṣayām āsa tūrṇaṃ; vadhāya rājan drupadātmajasya
GE07mbh_09_u:1528: 09,019.013a sa taṃ dvipaṃ sahasābhyāpatantam; avidhyad arkapratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1529: 09,019.013c karmāradhautair niśitair jvaladbhir; nārācamukhyais tribhir ugravegaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1530: 09,019.014a tato 'parān pañca śitān mahātmā; nārācamukhyān visasarja kumbhe
GE07mbh_09_u:1531: 09,019.014c sa tais tu viddhaḥ paramadvipo raṇe; tadā parāvṛtya bhṛśaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1533: 09,019.015a taṃ nāgarājaṃ sahasā praṇunnaṃ; vidrāvyamāṇaṃ ca nigṛhya
GE07mbh_09_u:1535: 09,019.015c tottrāṅkuśaiḥ preṣayām āsa tūrṇaṃ; pāñcālarājasya rathaṃ pradiśya
GE07mbh_09_u:1536: 09,019.016a dṛṣṭvāpatantaṃ sahasā tu nāgaṃ; dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ svarathāc chīghram eva 09,019.016c gadāṃ pragṛhyāśu javena vīro; bhūmiṃ prapanno bhayavihvalāṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1537: 09,019.017a sa taṃ rathaṃ hemavibhūṣitāṅgaṃ; sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ sahasā vimṛdya
GE07mbh_09_u:1538: 09,019.017c utkṣipya hastena tadā mahādvipo; vipothayām āsa vasuṃdharātale
GE07mbh_09_u:1539: 09,019.018a pāñcālarājasya sutaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā; tadārditaṃ nāgavareṇa tena
GE07mbh_09_u:1540: 09,019.018c tam abhyadhāvat sahasā javena; bhīmaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca śineś ca naptā
GE07mbh_09_u:1541: 09,019.019a śaraiś ca vegaṃ sahasā nigṛhya; tasyābhito 'bhyāpatato gajasya
GE07mbh_09_u:1542: 09,019.019c sa saṃgṛhīto rathibhir gajo vai; cacāla tair vāryamāṇaś ca saṃkhye 09,019.020a tataḥ pṛṣatkān pravavarṣa rājā; sūryo yathā raśmijālaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1544: 09,019.020c tenāśugair vadhyamānā rathaughāḥ; pradudruvus tatra tatas tu sarve 09,019.021a tat karma śālvasya samīkṣya sarve; pāñcālamatsyā nṛpa sṛñjayāś
GE07mbh_09_u:1546: 09,019.021c hāhākārair nādayantaḥ sma yuddhe; dvipaṃ samantād rurudhur
GE07mbh_09_u:1548: 09,019.022a pāñcālarājas tvaritas tu śūro; gadāṃ pragṛhyācalaśṛṅgakalpām 09,019.022c asaṃbhramaṃ bhārata śatrughātī; javena vīro 'nusasāra nāgam
GE07mbh_09_u:1549: 09,019.023a tato 'tha nāgaṃ dharaṇīdharābhaṃ; madaṃ sravantaṃ jaladaprakāśam
GE07mbh_09_u:1550: 09,019.023c gadāṃ samāvidhya bhṛśaṃ jaghāna; pāñcālarājasya sutas tarasvī
GE07mbh_09_u:1551: 09,019.024a sa bhinnakumbhaḥ sahasā vinadya; mukhāt prabhūtaṃ kṣatajaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:1553: 09,019.024c papāta nāgo dharaṇīdharābhaḥ; kṣitiprakampāc calito yathādriḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1554: 09,019.025a nipātyamāne tu tadā gajendre; hāhākṛte tava putrasya sainye
GE07mbh_09_u:1555: 09,019.025c sa śālvarājasya śinipravīro; jahāra bhallena śiraḥ śitena
GE07mbh_09_u:1556: 09,019.026a hṛtottamāṅgo yudhi sātvatena; papāta bhūmau saha nāgarājñā
GE07mbh_09_u:1557: 09,019.026c yathādriśṛṅgaṃ sumahat praṇunnaṃ; vajreṇa devādhipacoditena 09,020.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,020.001a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre śālve samitiśobhane
GE07mbh_09_u:1558: 09,020.001c tavābhajyad balaṃ vegād vāteneva mahādrumaḥ 09,020.002a tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1559: 09,020.002c dadhāra samare śūraḥ śatrusainyaṃ mahābalaḥ 09,020.003a saṃnivṛttās tu te śūrā dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:1560: 09,020.003c śailopamaṃ sthitaṃ rājan kīryamāṇaṃ śarair yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:1561: 09,020.004a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:1562: 09,020.004c nivṛttānāṃ mahārāja mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam 09,020.005a tatrāścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ sātvatasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:1563: 09,020.005c yad eko vārayām āsa pāṇḍusenāṃ durāsadām
GE07mbh_09_u:1564: 09,020.006a teṣām anyonyasuhṛdāṃ kṛte karmaṇi duṣkare 09,020.006c siṃhanādaḥ prahṛṣṭānāṃ divaḥspṛk sumahān abhūt 09,020.007a tena śabdena vitrastān pāñcālān bharatarṣabha 09,020.007c śiner naptā mahābāhur anvapadyata sātyakiḥ 09,020.007d*0115_01 śatavarmāṇam atyugraṃ mahāvīraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:1565: 09,020.008a sa samāsādya rājānaṃ kṣemadhūrtiṃ mahābalam 09,020.008c saptabhir niśitair bāṇair anayad yamasādanam 09,020.009a tam āyāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ pravapantaṃ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_09_u:1567: 09,020.010a tau siṃhāv iva nardantau dhanvinau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:1569: 09,020.011a pāṇḍavāḥ saha pāñcālair yodhāś cānye nṛpottamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1572: 09,020.012c abhijaghnatur anyonyaṃ prahṛṣṭāv iva kuñjarau 09,020.013a carantau vividhān mārgān hārdikyaśinipuṃgavau
GE07mbh_09_u:1573: 09,020.013c muhur antardadhāte tau bāṇavṛṣṭyā parasparam 09,020.014a cāpavegabaloddhūtān mārgaṇān vṛṣṇisiṃhayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1574: 09,020.014c ākāśe samapaśyāma pataṃgān iva śīghragān 09,020.015a tam ekaṃ satyakarmāṇam āsādya hṛdikātmajaḥ 09,020.015c avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_09_u:1575: 09,020.016a sa dīrghabāhuḥ saṃkruddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1578: 09,020.017c sātyakiṃ tribhir āhatya dhanur ekena cicchide
GE07mbh_09_u:1579: 09,020.018a nikṛttaṃ tad dhanuḥśreṣṭham apāsya śinipuṃgavaḥ 09,020.018c anyad ādatta vegena śaineyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1580: 09,020.019a tad ādāya dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanvinām 09,020.019c āropya ca mahāvīryo mahābuddhir mahābalaḥ 09,020.020a amṛṣyamāṇo dhanuṣaś chedanaṃ kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:1582: 09,020.021a tataḥ suniśitair bāṇair daśabhiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ 09,020.021c jaghāna sūtam aśvāṃś ca dhvajaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1583: 09,020.022a tato rājan maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ 09,020.022c hatāśvasūtaṃ saṃprekṣya rathaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:1584: 09,020.023a roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ śūlam udyamya māriṣa 09,020.023c cikṣepa bhujavegena jighāṃsuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1585: 09,020.024a tac chūlaṃ sātvato hy ājau nirbhidya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 09,020.024c cūrṇitaṃ pātayām āsa mohayann iva mādhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:1587: 09,020.025a sa yuddhe yuyudhānena hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ 09,020.025c kṛtavarmā kṛtāstreṇa dharaṇīm anvapadyata
GE07mbh_09_u:1588: 09,020.026a tasmin sātyakinā vīre dvairathe virathīkṛte 09,020.026c samapadyata sarveṣāṃ sainyānāṃ sumahad bhayam 09,020.027a putrasya tava cātyarthaṃ viṣādaḥ samapadyata 09,020.027c hatasūte hatāśve ca virathe kṛtavarmaṇi 09,020.028a hatāśvaṃ ca samālakṣya hatasūtam ariṃdamam 09,020.028c abhyadhāvat kṛpo rājañ jighāṃsuḥ śinipuṃgavam 09,020.029a tam āropya rathopasthe miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām 09,020.029c apovāha mahābāhus tūrṇam āyodhanād api 09,020.030a śaineye 'dhiṣṭhite rājan virathe kṛtavarmaṇi
GE07mbh_09_u:1589: 09,020.030c duryodhanabalaṃ sarvaṃ punar āsīt parāṅmukham 09,020.031a tatpare nāvabudhyanta sainyena rajasāvṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:1590: 09,020.031c tāvakāḥ pradrutā rājan duryodhanam ṛte nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:1591: 09,020.032a duryodhanas tu saṃprekṣya bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:1592: 09,020.032c javenābhyapatat tūrṇaṃ sarvāṃś caiko nyavārayat 09,020.033a pāṇḍūṃś ca sarvān saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:1593: 09,020.033c śikhaṇḍinaṃ draupadeyān pāñcālānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1594: 09,020.034a kekayān somakāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś caiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:1595: 09,020.034c asaṃbhramaṃ durādharṣaḥ śitair astrair avārayat 09,020.035a atiṣṭhad āhave yattaḥ putras tava mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1596: 09,020.035c yathā yajñe mahān agnir mantrapūtaḥ prakāśayan
GE07mbh_09_u:1598: 09,020.036a taṃ pare nābhyavartanta martyā mṛtyum ivāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:1599: 09,020.036c athānyaṃ ratham āsthāya hārdikyaḥ samapadyata 09,021.001 saṃjaya uvāca 09,021.001a putras tu te mahārāja rathastho rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1600: 09,021.001b*0117_01 durdharaḥ sa pumān kaś cit pāṇḍavān prati bhārata 09,021.001c durutsaho babhau yuddhe yathā rudraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1601: 09,021.002a tasya bāṇasahasrais tu pracchannā hy abhavan mahī
GE07mbh_09_u:1602: 09,021.002c parāṃś ca siṣice bāṇair dhārābhir iva parvatān
GE07mbh_09_u:1603: 09,021.003a na ca so 'sti pumān kaś cit pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāhave 09,021.003c hayo gajo ratho vāpi yo 'sya bāṇair avikṣataḥ 09,021.004a yaṃ yaṃ hi samare yodhaṃ prapaśyāmi viśāṃ pate 09,021.004c sa sa bāṇaiś cito 'bhūd vai putreṇa tava bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1604: 09,021.005a yathā sainyena rajasā samuddhūtena vāhinī 09,021.005c pratyadṛśyata saṃchannā tathā bāṇair mahātmanaḥ 09,021.006a bāṇabhūtām apaśyāma pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:1606: 09,021.007a teṣu yodhasahasreṣu tāvakeṣu pareṣu ca 09,021.007c eko duryodhano hy āsīt pumān iti matir mama 09,021.008a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya vikramam 09,021.008c yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nātyavartanta bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:1608: 09,021.009c bhīmasenaṃ ca saptatyā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1609: 09,021.010a nakulaṃ ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1610: 09,021.010c saptabhir draupadeyāṃś ca tribhir vivyādha sātyakim
GE07mbh_09_u:1611: 09,021.010e dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sahadevasya māriṣa 09,021.011a tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ mādrīputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:1612: 09,021.011c abhyadhāvata rājānaṃ pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ 09,021.011e tato duryodhanaṃ saṃkhye vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1613: 09,021.012a nakulaś ca tato vīro rājānaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:1614: 09,021.012c ghorarūpair maheṣvāso vivyādha ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_09_u:1616: 09,021.013c draupadeyās trisaptatyā dharmarājaś ca saptabhiḥ 09,021.013e aśītyā bhīmasenaś ca śarai rājānam ārdayat

GE07mbh_09_u:2478: 09,030.002a āsādya ca kuruśreṣṭha tadā dvaipāyanahradam 09,030.002c stambhitaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa dṛṣṭvā taṃ salilāśayam 09,030.002e vāsudevam idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurunandanaḥ 09,030.003a paśyemāṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa māyām apsu prayojitām 09,030.003c viṣṭabhya salilaṃ śete nāsya mānuṣato bhayam

GE07mbh_09_u:3342: 09,040.014a chidyamānaṃ yathānantaṃ vanaṃ paraśunā vibho 09,040.014c babhūvāpahataṃ tac cāpy avakīrṇam acetanam 09,040.015a dṛṣṭvā tad avakīrṇaṃ tu rāṣṭraṃ sa manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3343: 09,040.015c babhūva durmanā rājaṃś cintayām āsa ca prabhuḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3376: 09,041.001 janamejaya uvāca 09,041.001a vasiṣṭhasyāpavāho vai bhīmavegaḥ kathaṃ nu saḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3390: 09,041.010c dṛṣṭvā tejo vasiṣṭhasya cintām abhijagāma ha
