GE07mbh_09_u:3392: 09,041.011a iyaṃ sarasvatī tūrṇaṃ matsamīpaṃ tapodhanam 09,041.011c ānayiṣyati vegena vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam 09,041.011e ihāgataṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ haniṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ 09,041.012a evaṃ niścitya bhagavān viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 09,041.012c sasmāra saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3399: 09,041.016c yāvad enaṃ nihanmy adya tac chrutvā vyathitā nadī 09,041.017a sāñjaliṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇā 09,041.017c vivyathe suvirūḍheva latā vāyusamīritā
GE07mbh_09_u:3400: 09,041.018a tathāgatāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vepamānāṃ kṛtāñjalim

GE07mbh_09_u:3406: 09,041.019d*0254_05 vasiṣṭhasya prabhāvaṃ ca jānanty apratimaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:3407: 09,041.020a sābhigamya vasiṣṭhaṃ tu imam artham acodayat
GE07mbh_09_u:3408: 09,041.020c yad uktā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_09_u:3409: 09,041.021a ubhayoḥ śāpayor bhītā vepamānā punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:3414: 09,041.023c viśvāmitraḥ śaped dhi tvāṃ mā kṛthās tvaṃ vicāraṇām 09,041.024a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpāśīlasya sā sarit

GE07mbh_09_u:3418: 09,041.026c juhvānaṃ kauśikaṃ prekṣya sarasvaty abhyacintayat 09,041.027a idam antaram ity eva tataḥ sā saritāṃ varā 09,041.027c kūlāpahāram akarot svena vegena sā sarit
GE07mbh_09_u:3420: 09,041.028c uhyamānaś ca tuṣṭāva tadā rājan sarasvatīm

GE07mbh_09_u:3425: 09,041.031e tvam eva sarvabhūteṣu vasasīha caturvidhā 09,041.032a evaṃ sarasvatī rājan stūyamānā maharṣiṇā 09,041.032c vegenovāha taṃ vipraṃ viśvāmitrāśramaṃ prati 09,041.032e nyavedayata cābhīkṣṇaṃ viśvāmitrāya taṃ munim 09,041.033a tam ānītaṃ sarasvatyā dṛṣṭvā kopasamanvitaḥ 09,041.033b*0255_01 astrodyataḥ samuttiṣṭhad viśvāmitro muniṃ prati 09,041.033b*0255_02 taṃ gṛhītāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vasiṣṭhāntakaraṃ munim 09,041.033b*0255_03 kauśikaṃ sumahat kruddhaṃ kālamṛtyum ivāparam 09,041.033c athānveṣat praharaṇaṃ vasiṣṭhāntakaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:3426: 09,041.034a taṃ tu kruddham abhiprekṣya brahmahatyābhayān nadī

GE07mbh_09_u:3433: 09,041.037a tataḥ sarasvatī śaptā viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā 09,041.037c avahac choṇitonmiśraṃ toyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tadā 09,041.038a atharṣayaś ca devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā

GE07mbh_09_u:3435: 09,042.001c tasmiṃs tīrthavare śubhre śoṇitaṃ samupāvahat 09,042.002a athājagmus tato rājan rākṣasās tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:3436: 09,042.002c tatra te śoṇitaṃ sarve pibantaḥ sukham āsate
GE07mbh_09_u:3437: 09,042.003a tṛptāś ca subhṛśaṃ tena sukhitā vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3438: 09,042.003c nṛtyantaś ca hasantaś ca yathā svargajitas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3439: 09,042.004a kasya cit tv atha kālasya ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3441: 09,042.005a teṣu sarveṣu tīrtheṣu āplutya munipuṃgavāḥ 09,042.005c prāpya prītiṃ parāṃ cāpi tapolubdhā viśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3442: 09,042.005e prayayur hi tato rājan yena tīrthaṃ hi tat tathā

GE07mbh_09_u:3445: 09,042.007c paritrāṇe sarasvatyāḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ pracakrire 09,042.008a te tu sarve mahābhāgāḥ samāgamya mahāvratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3446: 09,042.008c āhūya saritāṃ śreṣṭhām idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:3447: 09,042.009a kāraṇaṃ brūhi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ te hrado hy ayam 09,042.009c evam ākulatāṃ yātaḥ śrutvā pāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:3448: 09,042.010a tataḥ sā sarvam ācaṣṭa yathāvṛttaṃ pravepatī
GE07mbh_09_u:3449: 09,042.010c duḥkhitām atha tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ta ūcur vai tapodhanāḥ 09,042.011a kāraṇaṃ śrutam asmābhiḥ śāpaś caiva śruto 'naghe

GE07mbh_09_u:3458: 09,042.013d*0257_01 evam uktvā ca munayo duḥkhāc caināṃ vyamocayan
GE07mbh_09_u:3459: 09,042.013e vimuktā ca saricchreṣṭhā vibabhau sā yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:3460: 09,042.014a dṛṣṭvā toyaṃ sarasvatyā munibhis tais tathā kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:3461: 09,042.014b*0258_01 tān eva śaraṇaṃ jagmū rākṣasāḥ kṣudhitās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3462: 09,042.014c kṛtāñjalīs tato rājan rākṣasāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ 09,042.014e ūcus tān vai munīn sarvān kṛpāyuktān punaḥ punaḥ 09,042.015a vayaṃ hi kṣudhitāś caiva dharmād dhīnāś ca śāśvatāt 09,042.015c na ca naḥ kāmakāro 'yaṃ yad vayaṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3463: 09,042.016a yuṣmākaṃ cāprasādena duṣkṛtena ca karmaṇā 09,042.016c pakṣo 'yaṃ vardhate 'smākaṃ yataḥ sma brahmarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3464: 09,042.017a evaṃ hi vaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3465: 09,042.017c ye brāhmaṇān pradviṣanti te bhavantīha rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3466: 09,042.018a ācāryam ṛtvijaṃ caiva guruṃ vṛddhajanaṃ tathā

GE07mbh_09_u:3469: 09,042.019a tat kurudhvam ihāsmākaṃ kāruṇyaṃ dvijasattamāḥ 09,042.019c śaktā bhavantaḥ sarveṣāṃ lokānām api tāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:3470: 09,042.020a teṣāṃ te munayaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvus tāṃ mahānadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:3471: 09,042.020c mokṣārthaṃ rakṣasāṃ teṣām ūcuḥ prayatamānasāḥ 09,042.021a kṣutakīṭāvapannaṃ ca yac cocchiṣṭāśitaṃ bhavet 09,042.021c keśāvapannam ādhūtam ārugṇam api yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:3472: 09,042.021d*0260_01 avadhūtam avijñātam atiśītaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:3473: 09,042.021d*0260_02 patitānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ puṃścalyānnaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:3474: 09,042.021e śvabhiḥ saṃspṛṣṭam annaṃ ca bhāgo 'sau rakṣasām iha 09,042.022a tasmāj jñātvā sadā vidvān etāny annāni varjayet
GE07mbh_09_u:3475: 09,042.022c rākṣasānnam asau bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte hy annam īdṛśam 09,042.023a śodhayitvā tatas tīrtham ṛṣayas te tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3476: 09,042.023c mokṣārthaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca nadīṃ tāṃ pratyacodayan
GE07mbh_09_u:3477: 09,042.024a maharṣīṇāṃ mataṃ jñātvā tataḥ sā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:3478: 09,042.024c aruṇām ānayām āsa svāṃ tanuṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:3479: 09,042.025a tasyāṃ te rākṣasāḥ snātvā tanūs tyaktvā divaṃ gatāḥ 09,042.025c aruṇāyāṃ mahārāja brahmahatyāpahā hi sā 09,042.026a etam artham abhijñāya devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ 09,042.026c tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā vimuktaḥ pāpmanā kila
GE07mbh_09_u:3480: 09,042.027 janamejaya uvāca 09,042.027a kimarthaṃ bhagavāñ śakro brahmahatyām avāptavān 09,042.027c katham asmiṃś ca tīrthe vai āplutyākalmaṣo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:3481: 09,042.028 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 09,042.028a śṛṇuṣvaitad upākhyānaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:3482: 09,042.028c yathā bibheda samayaṃ namucer vāsavaḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:3483: 09,042.029a namucir vāsavād bhītaḥ sūryaraśmiṃ samāviśat 09,042.029c tenendraḥ sakhyam akarot samayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:3484: 09,042.030a nārdreṇa tvā na śuṣkeṇa na rātrau nāpi vāhani 09,042.030c vadhiṣyāmy asuraśreṣṭha sakhe satyena te śape
GE07mbh_09_u:3485: 09,042.031a evaṃ sa kṛtvā samayaṃ sṛṣṭvā nīhāram īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3486: 09,042.031c cicchedāsya śiro rājann apāṃ phenena vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3487: 09,042.032a tac chiro namuceś chinnaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ śakram anvayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:3488: 09,042.032c he mitrahan pāpa iti bruvāṇaṃ śakram antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:3489: 09,042.033a evaṃ sa śirasā tena codyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3490: 09,042.033c pitāmahāya saṃtapta evam arthaṃ nyavedayat 09,042.034a tam abravīl lokagurur aruṇāyāṃ yathāvidhi 09,042.034c iṣṭvopaspṛśa devendra brahmahatyāpahā hi sā 09,042.034d*0261_01 eṣā puṇyajalā śakra kṛtā munibhir eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:3491: 09,042.034d*0261_02 nigūḍham asyā gamanam ihāsīt pūrvam eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:3493: 09,042.034d*0261_04 sarasvatyāruṇāyāś ca puṇyo 'yaṃ saṃgamo mahān 09,042.034d*0261_05 iha tvaṃ yaja devendra dada dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3494: 09,042.034d*0261_06 atrāplutya sughorāt tvaṃ pātakād vipramokṣyase 09,042.035a ity uktaḥ sa sarasvatyāḥ kuñje vai janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:3495: 09,042.035c iṣṭvā yathāvad balabhid aruṇāyām upāspṛśat 09,042.036a sa muktaḥ pāpmanā tena brahmahatyākṛtena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:3496: 09,042.036b*0262_01 brahmaṇo vacanāc chakro 'yajad yajñair anekaśaḥ 09,042.036b*0262_02 dattvā dānāny anekāni snātvā tīrthe śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3497: 09,042.036b*0262_03 vipāpmā virajāḥ śrīmān brahmavadhyāṃ vidhūya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3499: 09,042.037a śiras tac cāpi namuces tatraivāplutya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:3500: 09,042.037c lokān kāmadughān prāptam akṣayān rājasattama 09,042.038a tatrāpy upaspṛśya balo mahātmā; dattvā ca dānāni pṛthagvidhāni
GE07mbh_09_u:3501: 09,042.038c avāpya dharmaṃ param āryakarmā; jagāma somasya mahat sa tīrtham 09,042.039a yatrāyajad rājasūyena somaḥ; sākṣāt purā vidhivat pārthivendra
GE07mbh_09_u:3502: 09,042.039c atrir dhīmān vipramukhyo babhūva; hotā yasmin kratumukhye
GE07mbh_09_u:3504: 09,042.040a yasyānte 'bhūt sumahān dānavānāṃ; daiteyānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3506: 09,042.040c sa saṃgrāmas tārakākhyaḥ sutīvro; yatra skandas tārakākhyaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:3508: 09,042.041a senāpatyaṃ labdhavān devatānāṃ; mahāseno yatra daityāntakartā
GE07mbh_09_u:3509: 09,042.041c sākṣāc cātra nyavasat kārttikeyaḥ; sadā kumāro yatra sa plakṣarājaḥ 09,043.001 janamejaya uvāca 09,043.001a sarasvatyāḥ prabhāvo 'yam uktas te dvijasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:3510: 09,043.001c kumārasyābhiṣekaṃ tu brahman vyākhyātum arhasi 09,043.002a yasmin kāle ca deśe ca yathā ca vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:3511: 09,043.002c yaiś cābhiṣikto bhagavān vidhinā yena ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3512: 09,043.003a skando yathā ca daityānām akarot kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:3513: 09,043.003c tathā me sarvam ācakṣva paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me 09,043.004 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 09,043.004a kuruvaṃśasya sadṛśam idaṃ kautūhalaṃ tava 09,043.004c harṣam utpādayaty etad vaco me janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:3514: 09,043.005a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇvānasya janādhipa 09,043.005c abhiṣekaṃ kumārasya prabhāvaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ 09,043.006a tejo māheśvaraṃ skannam agnau prapatitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:3515: 09,043.006c tat sarvabhakṣo bhagavān nāśakad dagdhum akṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:3517: 09,043.007c na caiva dhārayām āsa garbhaṃ tejomayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:3518: 09,043.008a sa gaṅgām abhisaṃgamya niyogād brahmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3520: 09,043.009a atha gaṅgāpi taṃ garbham asahantī vidhāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:3521: 09,043.009c utsasarja girau ramye himavaty amarārcite 09,043.010a sa tatra vavṛdhe lokān āvṛtya jvalanātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3522: 09,043.010c dadṛśur jvalanākāraṃ taṃ garbham atha kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3525: 09,043.012a tāsāṃ viditvā bhāvaṃ taṃ mātṝṇāṃ bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3526: 09,043.012c prasnutānāṃ payaḥ ṣaḍbhir vadanair apibat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:3527: 09,043.013a taṃ prabhāvaṃ samālakṣya tasya bālasya kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3528: 09,043.013c paraṃ vismayam āpannā devyo divyavapurdharāḥ 09,043.014a yatrotsṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān gaṅgayā girimūrdhani 09,043.014c sa śailaḥ kāñcanaḥ sarvaḥ saṃbabhau kurusattama
GE07mbh_09_u:3529: 09,043.015a vardhatā caiva garbheṇa pṛthivī tena rañjitā
GE07mbh_09_u:3530: 09,043.015c ataś ca sarve saṃvṛttā girayaḥ kāñcanākarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3531: 09,043.016a kumāraś ca mahāvīryaḥ kārttikeya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3533: 09,043.017a sa devas tapasā caiva vīryeṇa ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3535: 09,043.018a sa tasmin kāñcane divye śarastambe śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3536: 09,043.018c stūyamānas tadā śete gandharvair munibhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3539: 09,043.020a anvāste ca nadī devaṃ gaṅgā vai saritāṃ varā 09,043.020c dadhāra pṛthivī cainaṃ bibhratī rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:3540: 09,043.021a jātakarmādikās tasya kriyāś cakre bṛhaspatiḥ 09,043.021c vedaś cainaṃ caturmūrtir upatasthe kṛtāñjaliḥ 09,043.022a dhanurvedaś catuṣpādaḥ śastragrāmaḥ sasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3541: 09,043.022c tatrainaṃ samupātiṣṭhat sākṣād vāṇī ca kevalā
GE07mbh_09_u:3542: 09,043.023a sa dadarśa mahāvīryaṃ devadevam umāpatim 09,043.023c śailaputryā sahāsīnaṃ bhūtasaṃghaśatair vṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:3545: 09,043.025a vyāghrasiṃharkṣavadanā biḍālamakarānanāḥ 09,043.025c vṛṣadaṃśamukhāś cānye gajoṣṭravadanās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3549: 09,043.027c sadṛśāni vapūṃṣy anye tatra tatra vyadhārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:3551: 09,043.028c ke cid añjanapuñjābhāḥ ke cic chvetācalaprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3552: 09,043.029a saptamātṛgaṇāś caiva samājagmur viśāṃ pate 09,043.029c sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto vasavaḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:3553: 09,043.030a rudrādityās tathā siddhā bhujagā dānavāḥ khagāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3554: 09,043.030c brahmā svayaṃbhūr bhagavān saputraḥ saha viṣṇunā
GE07mbh_09_u:3555: 09,043.031a śakras tathābhyayād draṣṭuṃ kumāravaram acyutam 09,043.031c nāradapramukhāś cāpi devagandharvasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3556: 09,043.032a devarṣayaś ca siddhāś ca bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ 09,043.032c ṛbhavo nāma varadā devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3557: 09,043.032e te 'pi tatra samājagmur yāmā dhāmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3558: 09,043.033a sa tu bālo 'pi bhagavān mahāyogabalānvitaḥ 09,043.033c abhyājagāma deveśaṃ śūlahastaṃ pinākinam
GE07mbh_09_u:3559: 09,043.034a tam āvrajantam ālakṣya śivasyāsīn manogatam 09,043.034c yugapac chailaputryāś ca gaṅgāyāḥ pāvakasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3560: 09,043.035a kiṃ nu pūrvam ayaṃ bālo gauravād abhyupaiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:3561: 09,043.035c api mām iti sarveṣāṃ teṣām āsīn manogatam
GE07mbh_09_u:3562: 09,043.036a teṣām etam abhiprāyaṃ caturṇām upalakṣya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3563: 09,043.036c yugapad yogam āsthāya sasarja vividhās tanūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3565: 09,043.037c skandaḥ śākho viśākhaś ca naigameṣaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3566: 09,043.038a evaṃ sa kṛtvā hy ātmānaṃ caturdhā bhagavān prabhuḥ 09,043.038c yato rudras tataḥ skando jagāmādbhutadarśanaḥ 09,043.039a viśākhas tu yayau yena devī girivarātmajā
GE07mbh_09_u:3567: 09,043.039c śākho yayau ca bhagavān vāyumūrtir vibhāvasum
GE07mbh_09_u:3569: 09,043.040a sarve bhāsvaradehās te catvāraḥ samarūpiṇaḥ 09,043.040c tān samabhyayur avyagrās tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:3571: 09,043.041c tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:3572: 09,043.042a tato rudraś ca devī ca pāvakaś ca pitāmaham 09,043.042c gaṅgayā sahitāḥ sarve praṇipetur jagatpatim 09,043.043a praṇipatya tatas te tu vidhivad rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_09_u:3573: 09,043.043c idam ūcur vaco rājan kārttikeyapriyepsayā 09,043.044a asya bālasya bhagavann ādhipatyaṃ yathepsitam 09,043.044c asmatpriyārthaṃ deveśa sadṛśaṃ dātum arhasi 09,043.045a tataḥ sa bhagavān dhīmān sarvalokapitāmahaḥ 09,043.045c manasā cintayām āsa kim ayaṃ labhatām iti
GE07mbh_09_u:3577: 09,043.047c samarthaṃ ca tam aiśvarye mahāmatir amanyata
GE07mbh_09_u:3578: 09,043.048a tato muhūrtaṃ sa dhyātvā devānāṃ śreyasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3579: 09,043.048c senāpatyaṃ dadau tasmai sarvabhūteṣu bhārata 09,043.049a sarvadevanikāyānāṃ ye rājānaḥ pariśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3581: 09,043.050a tataḥ kumāram ādāya devā brahmapurogamāḥ 09,043.050c abhiṣekārtham ājagmuḥ śailendraṃ sahitās tataḥ 09,043.051a puṇyāṃ haimavatīṃ devīṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ sarasvatīm 09,043.051c samantapañcake yā vai triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_09_u:3582: 09,043.052a tatra tīre sarasvatyāḥ puṇye sarvaguṇānvite 09,043.052c niṣedur devagandharvāḥ sarve saṃpūrṇamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3583: 09,044.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 09,044.001a tato 'bhiṣekasaṃbhārān sarvān saṃbhṛtya śāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3584: 09,044.001c bṛhaspatiḥ samiddhe 'gnau juhāvājyaṃ yathāvidhi 09,044.002a tato himavatā datte
GE07mbh_09_u:3586: 09,044.003a sarvamaṅgalasaṃbhārair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam 09,044.003c ābhiṣecanikaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhītvā devatāgaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3588: 09,044.004c dhātā caiva vidhātā ca tathā caivānilānalau
GE07mbh_09_u:3589: 09,044.005a pūṣṇā bhagenāryamṇā ca aṃśena ca vivasvatā
GE07mbh_09_u:3590: 09,044.005c rudraś ca sahito dhīmān mitreṇa varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3591: 09,044.006a rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3592: 09,044.006c viśvedevair marudbhiś ca sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:3594: 09,044.007c devarṣibhir asaṃkhyeyais tathā brahmarṣibhir varaiḥ 09,044.008a vaikhānasair vālakhilyair vāyvāhārair marīcipaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3595: 09,044.008c bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3596: 09,044.008e sarvair vidyādharaiḥ puṇyair yogasiddhais tathā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3597: 09,044.009a pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca pulahaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3598: 09,044.009c aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo 'triś ca marīcir bhṛgur eva ca 09,044.010a kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca manur dakṣas tathaiva ca 09,044.010c ṛtavaś ca grahāś caiva jyotīṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate 09,044.011a mūrtimatyaś ca sarito vedāś caiva sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3599: 09,044.011c samudrāś ca hradāś caiva tīrthāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3600: 09,044.011e pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pādapāś ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:3601: 09,044.012a aditir devamātā ca hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:3602: 09,044.012c umā śacī sinīvālī tathā cānumatiḥ kuhūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3603: 09,044.012e rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva patnyaś cānyā divaukasām
GE07mbh_09_u:3604: 09,044.013a himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān
GE07mbh_09_u:3605: 09,044.013c airāvataḥ sānucaraḥ kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:3606: 09,044.013e māsārdhamāsā ṛtavas tathā rātryahanī nṛpa 09,044.014a uccaiḥśravā hayaśreṣṭho nāgarājaś ca vāmanaḥ 09,044.014c aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vṛkṣāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:3607: 09,044.015a dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ samājagmur hi saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:3608: 09,044.015c kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca yamasyānucarāś ca ye 09,044.016a bahulatvāc ca noktā ye vividhā devatāgaṇāḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:4109: 09,049.040a āruhya ca gavāṃ lokaṃ prayāntaṃ brahmasatriṇām

GE07mbh_09_u:4115: 09,049.043c prabhāvaṃ suvratatvaṃ ca siddhiṃ yogasya cātulām

GE07mbh_09_u:4119: 09,049.045c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me 09,049.045d*0295_01 so 'py apṛcchad yadā siddhān abruvan pṛcchate tadā

GE07mbh_09_u:4129: 09,049.051a tato buddhyā vyagaṇayad devalo dharmayuktayā 09,049.051c dṛṣṭvā prabhāvaṃ tapaso jaigīṣavyasya yogajam 09,049.052a tato 'bravīn mahātmānaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:4134: 09,049.055a saṃnyāsakṛtabuddhiṃ taṃ bhūtāni pitṛbhiḥ saha 09,049.055c tato dṛṣṭvā praruruduḥ ko 'smān saṃvibhajiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:4135: 09,049.056a devalas tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhūtānāṃ karuṇaṃ tathā

GE07mbh_09_u:4138: 09,049.057c puṣpāṇy oṣadhayaś caiva rorūyante sahasraśaḥ 09,049.058a punar no devalaḥ kṣudro nūnaṃ chetsyati durmatiḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:4204: 09,050.040a teṣāṃ kṣudhāparītānāṃ naṣṭā vedā vidhāvatām 09,050.040c sarveṣām eva rājendra na kaś cit pratibhānavān

GE07mbh_09_u:4212: 09,050.046a yo hy adharmeṇa vibrūyād gṛhṇīyād vāpy adharmataḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:4564: 09,056.020a evaṃ tau vicarantau tu nyaghnatāṃ vai parasparam

GE07mbh_09_u:4574: 09,056.025c dadṛśus te mahārāja bhīmasenasya tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:4575: 09,056.026a āvidhyantaṃ gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaṃ tavātmajaḥ 09,056.026c samudyamya gadāṃ ghorāṃ pratyavidhyad ariṃdamaḥ 09,056.026d*0327_01 yamadaṇḍanibhāṃ rājan ghorāṃ prati ariṃdamaḥ 09,056.027a gadāmārutavegena tava putrasya bhārata

GE07mbh_09_u:4578: 09,056.028a sa caran vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4579: 09,056.028c samaśobhata tejasvī bhūyo bhīmāt suyodhanaḥ 09,056.029a āviddhā sarvavegena bhīmena mahatī gadā 09,056.029c sadhūmaṃ sārciṣaṃ cāgniṃ mumocogrā mahāsvanā 09,056.029d*0329_01 udvamac cārciṣo vahniṃ sasphuliṅgaṃ samantataḥ 09,056.030a ādhūtāṃ bhīmasenena gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā suyodhanaḥ 09,056.030c adrisāramayīṃ gurvīm āvidhyan bahv aśobhata 09,056.031a gadāmārutavegaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā tasya mahātmanaḥ 09,056.031c bhayaṃ viveśa pāṇḍūn vai sarvān eva sasomakān

GE07mbh_09_u:4583: 09,056.034a evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpam asaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:4585: 09,056.035a dṛṣṭvā vyavasthitaṃ bhīmaṃ tava putro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4586: 09,056.035c caraṃś citratarān mārgān kaunteyam abhidudruve 09,056.036a tasya bhīmo mahāvegāṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:4587: 09,056.036c abhikruddhasya kruddhas tu tāḍayām āsa tāṃ gadām

GE07mbh_09_u:4594: 09,056.041c nākampata mahārāja tad adbhutam ivābhavat 09,056.042a āścaryaṃ cāpi tad rājan sarvasainyāny apūjayan
GE07mbh_09_u:4595: 09,056.042c yad gadābhihato bhīmo nākampata padāt padam
GE07mbh_09_u:4596: 09,056.043a tato gurutarāṃ dīptāṃ gadāṃ hemapariṣkṛtām 09,056.043c duryodhanāya vyasṛjad bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:4597: 09,056.044a taṃ prahāram asaṃbhrānto lāghavena mahābalaḥ 09,056.044c moghaṃ duryodhanaś cakre tatrābhūd vismayo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:4598: 09,056.045a sā tu moghā gadā rājan patantī bhīmacoditā

GE07mbh_09_u:4617: 09,056.059c udbhinnarudhiro rājan prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ 09,056.059d*0331_01 sa saṃkruddho mahārāja bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ 09,056.060a tato gadāṃ vīrahaṇīm ayasmayīṃ; pragṛhya vajrāśanitulyanisvanām 09,056.060c atāḍayac chatrum amitrakarśano; balena vikramya dhanaṃjayāgrajaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:4622: 09,056.063a sa pārthivo nityam amarṣitas tadā; mahārathaḥ śikṣitavat paribhraman

GE07mbh_09_u:4627: 09,056.065c papāta coccair amarapraveritaṃ; vicitrapuṣpotkaravarṣam uttamam 09,056.066a tataḥ parān āviśad uttamaṃ bhayaṃ; samīkṣya bhūmau patitaṃ

GE07mbh_09_u:4647: 09,057.006a pratijñātaṃ tu bhīmena dyūtakāle dhanaṃjaya 09,057.006c ūrū bhetsyāmi te saṃkhye gadayeti suyodhanam

GE07mbh_09_u:5208: 09,064.009c moham abhyāgaman sarve kṛpaprabhṛtayo rathāḥ 09,064.010a avatīrya rathebhyas tu prādravan rājasaṃnidhau 09,064.010c duryodhanaṃ ca saṃprekṣya sarve bhūmāv upāviśan

GE07mbh_09_u:5214: 09,064.014c nāpi tān suhṛdaḥ sarvān kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha

GE07mbh_09_u:5216: 09,064.015c lokānāṃ ca bhavān yatra śete pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5217: 09,064.016a eṣa mūrdhāvasiktānām agre gatvā paraṃtapaḥ 09,064.016c satṛṇaṃ grasate pāṃsuṃ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_09_u:5218: 09,064.017a kva te tad amalaṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ kva ca pārthiva

GE07mbh_09_u:5221: 09,064.017d*0390_01 bhrātaras te mahārāja vīryaśakrasamā yudhi 09,064.017d*0390_02 śatrūṇāṃ ca nihantāro mahābalaparākramāḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:5225: 09,064.018a durvijñeyā gatir nūnaṃ kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇāntare 09,064.018c yad vai lokagurur bhūtvā bhavān etāṃ daśāṃ gataḥ 09,064.019a adhruvā sarvamartyeṣu dhruvaṃ śrīr upalakṣyate 09,064.019b*0391_01 dhruveva bhāti sarvatra nityaṃ mohakarī nṛṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:5226: 09,064.019b*0391_02 vivekibhir nṛbhir nityaṃ cintyamānā viśeṣataḥ 09,064.019b*0391_03 na tu viśvasen nityāṃ vai hy adhruvā vai svabhāvataḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:5228: 09,064.020a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitasya viśeṣataḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:5234: 09,064.023a so 'yaṃ māṃ samanuprāptaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatāṃ hi yaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5235: 09,064.023c pṛthivīṃ pālayitvāham etāṃ niṣṭhām upāgataḥ 09,064.024a diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto yuddhe kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_09_u:5236: 09,064.024b*0393_01 diṣṭyāhaṃ no nṛpatibhir nirjito na kadā cana

GE07mbh_09_u:5238: 09,064.024c diṣṭyāhaṃ nihataḥ pāpaiś chalenaiva viśeṣataḥ 09,064.024c*0394_01 **** **** pāṇḍuputrair durātmabhiḥ 09,064.024c*0394_02 adharmato gadāyuddhe 09,064.025a utsāhaś ca kṛto nityaṃ mayā diṣṭyā yuyutsatā

GE07mbh_09_u:5241: 09,064.025b*0395_08 diṣṭyā mamāyudhāny āśu nāśam āyānti vai kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:5242: 09,064.025c diṣṭyā cāsmi hato yuddhe nihatajñātibāndhavaḥ 09,064.026a diṣṭyā ca vo 'haṃ paśyāmi muktān asmāj janakṣayāt

GE07mbh_09_u:5244: 09,064.026c svastiyuktāṃś ca kalyāṃś ca tan me priyam anuttamam 09,064.027a mā bhavanto 'nutapyantāṃ sauhṛdān nidhanena me
GE07mbh_09_u:5245: 09,064.027c yadi vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ vo jitā lokā mayākṣayāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5247: 09,064.028c tena na cyāvitaś cāhaṃ kṣatradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
GE07mbh_09_u:5248: 09,064.029a sa mayā samanuprāpto nāsmi śocyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:5249: 09,064.029b*0397_01 tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rājendra vartate vijayo mama
GE07mbh_09_u:5250: 09,064.029c kṛtaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśam anurūpam ivātmanaḥ 09,064.029e yatitaṃ vijaye nityaṃ daivaṃ tu duratikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:5252: 09,064.030c tūṣṇīṃ babhūva rājendra rujāsau vihvalo bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:5253: 09,064.031a tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ bāṣpaśokasamanvitam 09,064.031c drauṇiḥ krodhena jajvāla yathā vahnir jagatkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:5254: 09,064.032a sa tu krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pāṇau pāṇiṃ nipīḍya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:5255: 09,064.032c bāṣpavihvalayā vācā rājānam idam abravīt 09,064.033a pitā me nihataḥ kṣudraiḥ sunṛśaṃsena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:5256: 09,064.033c na tathā tena tapyāmi yathā rājaṃs tvayādya vai 09,064.034a śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mahyaṃ satyena vadataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:5258: 09,064.034b*0398_02 tava priyaṃ kariṣyāmi kṛtvā kāryam anuttamam

GE07mbh_09_u:5265: 09,064.035d*0401_01 adya rātrau mahārāja nihaniṣyāmi pāṇḍavān 09,064.035e anujñāṃ tu mahārāja bhavān me dātum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:5266: 09,064.036a iti śrutvā tu vacanaṃ droṇaputrasya kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5267: 09,064.036b*0402_01 tac chrutvā vacanaṃ drauṇer dhṛtarāṣṭra tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:5268: 09,064.036c manasaḥ prītijananaṃ kṛpaṃ vacanam abravīt 09,064.036e ācārya śīghraṃ kalaśaṃ jalapūrṇaṃ samānaya 09,064.037a sa tad vacanam ājñāya rājño brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
